analyzed: mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste /
translated: are without marks.

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who train in this absence of marks of all phenomena

original: dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te /
translated: will increase in many virtuous qualities.

original: 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong @92b pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong @92b pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: In this way, the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration,🔽the perfection of wisdom, inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the compounded, the emptiness of the uncompounded, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of beginning and end, the emptiness of nonrepudiation, the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of its own mark, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of magical emanation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the eightfold noble path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag @93a *//
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag @93a *//
translated: the absence of attributes,🔽the absence of aspiration,🔽the five higher perceptions,🔽all the meditative stabilities,🔽all the dhāraṇī gateways,🔽the ten powers of the tathāgatas,🔽the four fearlessnesses,🔽the four kinds of correct knowledge,🔽

original: par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa de dag gis rnam par 'phel lo //
analyzed: par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa de dag gis rnam par 'phel lo //
translated: the five higher knowledges, all the meditative stabilizations, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, and the immeasurable other buddhadharmas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
translated: Because bodhisattva great beings

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bya bam gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bya bam gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do //
translated: have no other training than the training in emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'dus pa med de /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'dus pa med de /
translated: All virtuous dharmas are included in the three gates of liberation.

original: 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni /
translated: Thus, the emptiness of its own mark

original: stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
translated: is the gate of liberation that is emptiness.

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba ni /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba ni /
translated: The absence of a sign

original: mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
translated: is the gate of liberation that is signlessness.

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni /
translated: The absence of an objective reference

original: smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste /
analyzed: smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste /
translated: is the gate of liberation that is aimlessness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who trains in these three gates of liberation

original: phung po lnga la slob pa yin /
analyzed: phung po lnga la slob pa yin /
translated: trains in the five aggregates,

original: skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin /
analyzed: skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin /
translated: trains in the twelve sense fields,

original: khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin /
analyzed: khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin /
translated: trains in the eighteen elements,

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin /
translated: trains in the twelve links of dependent origination,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin; tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin; tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin /
translated: trains in the perfection of generosity, trains in the perfection of morality,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan @93b gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan @93b gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin /🔽nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin / nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the perfection of wisdom,🔽they are training in inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /🔽chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin / chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the emptiness of emptiness,🔽they are training in great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in ultimate emptiness,🔽they are training in conditioned emptiness,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in unconditioned emptiness,🔽they are training in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the emptiness of beginning and end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the emptiness of no-abandoning,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the emptiness of the essential nature;

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the emptiness of all phenomena;

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the emptiness of its own mark;🔽they are training in the emptiness of nonapprehension;

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the emptiness of nonthings;🔽they are training in the emptiness of essential nature;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings;

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the four establishments of mindfulness;

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the four right efforts;

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob ba yin /🔽dbang po lnga la slob pa yin /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob ba yin / dbang po lnga la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the four legs of miraculous power;🔽they are training in the five faculties;

original: stobs lnga la slob pa yin /
analyzed: stobs lnga la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the five powers;

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the seven parts of awakening;

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the eightfold noble path;🔽they are training in the four noble truths;

original: bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin /
translated: they are training in the four concentrations;

original: tshad med pa bzhi la slob pa yin /🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par @94a *//
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi la slob pa yin / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par @94a *//
translated: They train in the four immeasurables.

original: 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin /
analyzed: 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in the four formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in the eight aspects of liberation.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la slob pa yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in the three gateways to liberation—namely, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in the five kinds of supernormal knowledge.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la slob pa yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in all the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in all the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in the four assurances.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin /🔽byams pa chen po la slob pa yin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin / byams pa chen po la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in the four kinds of exact knowledge.🔽They train in great loving kindness.

original: snying rje chen po la slob pa yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they train in the knowledge of all modes;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they train in the knowledge of paths;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: they train in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord!

original: rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nye bar lan pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nye bar lan pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags /
translated: In what way, in what manner do bodhisattva great beings training in the perfection of wisdom train in the five appropriating aggregates?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs rab tu shes te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs rab tu shes te /
translated: “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom know form;

original: gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs @94b kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin pa rab tu shes so //🔽de la ji ltar na /
analyzed: gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs @94b kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin pa rab tu shes so // de la ji ltar na /
translated: they know how form arises, how form ceases, and what the suchness of form is.

original: gzugs shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: What is it to know form?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: dper na / dbu ba'i phung po snying po med pa ltar shin tu gsong ldang dang / shin tu gse tshogs dang / shin tu snying po med par rab tu shes te /
analyzed: dper na / dbu ba'i phung po snying po med pa ltar shin tu gsong ldang dang / shin tu gse tshogs dang / shin tu snying po med par rab tu shes te /
translated: Just like a mass of foam, it is very insubstantial, very fragile, and very hollow.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: gzugs shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: gzugs shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: form is consciousness.

original: gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that the arising and cessation of form is known?

original: gzugs ni / gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing /🔽gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas /
analyzed: gzugs ni / gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas /
translated: Form does not come from anywhere🔽and does not go anywhere.

original: gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
analyzed: gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
translated: It does not come from anywhere

original: gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste /
translated: and does not go anywhere.

original: gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste /
analyzed: gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste /
translated: That which does not come from anywhere does not go anywhere.🔽Thus,

original: de ltar na; gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na; gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: the arising and cessation of form is known.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that the suchness of form is known?

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: The suchness of form

original: mi skye / mi 'gag /
analyzed: mi skye / mi 'gag /
translated: is unborn and unceasing,

original: 'ong ba med /🔽'gro ba med kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'ong ba med / 'gro ba med kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
translated: does not come and does not go,

original: rnam par byang ba ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba ma yin /
translated: is not defiled and is not purified,

original: 'bri ba ma yin /🔽'phel ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bri ba ma yin / 'phel ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not diminished.🔽It is not increased.

original: phyin ci log ma yin zhing /
analyzed: phyin ci log ma yin zhing /
translated: It is not distorted.

original: de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste /
translated: It abides in suchness.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called suchness.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes ba yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes ba yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: one understands the suchness of form.

original: tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: “How does one understand feelings?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste /
analyzed: dper na / chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste /
translated: for example, just as a mass of water bubbles arises and ceases, so it is understood.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: tshor ba shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: tshor ba shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: one understands feelings.

original: tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: “How does one understand the arising and cessation of feelings?

original: tshor ba ni /
analyzed: tshor ba ni /
translated: Feelings do not come from anywhere🔽or go anywhere.

original: gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang bu rang 'gro ba med pas /
analyzed: gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang bu rang 'gro ba med pas /
translated: They do not come from anywhere

original: gang nas @95a *//🔽kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: gang nas @95a *// kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste /
translated: or go anywhere.

original: gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste /
analyzed: gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste /
translated: One understands that whatever does not come from anywhere does not go anywhere.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no; ;ji ltar na /
analyzed: tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no; ;ji ltar na /
translated: one understands the arising and cessation of feelings.🔽“How does one understand the emptiness of feelings?

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: If you ask how one understands the suchness of feeling,

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: the suchness of feeling

original: mi skye / mi 'gag /🔽'ong ba med /
analyzed: mi skye / mi 'gag / 'ong ba med /
translated: is unborn and unceasing.

original: 'gro ba med /🔽kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'gro ba med / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
translated: It does not come and it does not go.

original: rnam par byang ba ma yin /🔽'bri ba ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba ma yin / 'bri ba ma yin /
translated: It is not afflicted and it is not purified.

original: 'phel ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'phel ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not diminished and it is not increased.

original: phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste /
translated: It is not inverted and it abides as suchness.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called suchness.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: one understands the suchness of feeling.

original: 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: If you ask how one understands perception,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / smig rgyal chu shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste /
analyzed: dper na / smig rgyal chu shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste /
translated: just as a mirage is not at all observed to be water, so it is understood.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: 'du shes shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: 'du shes shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: one understands perception.

original: 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes ba yin zhe na /
translated: If you ask how one understands the arising and cessation of perception,

original: 'du shes ni /
analyzed: 'du shes ni /
translated: perception

original: gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing /
analyzed: gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing /
translated: does not come from anywhere

original: gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste; gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang mas 'khor shes pa ste /
analyzed: gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste; gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang mas 'khor shes pa ste /
translated: Since it does not come from anywhere, it does not go anywhere.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: he knows the arising and cessation of perception.

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: How does he know the suchness of perception?

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: The suchness of perception

original: mi skye / mi 'gag /🔽'ong ba med /
analyzed: mi skye / mi 'gag / 'ong ba med /
translated: is unborn and unceasing.

original: 'gro ba med /🔽kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'gro ba med / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
translated: It does not come and it does not go.🔽It is not afflicted and it is not purified.🔽It does not decrease and it does not increase.

original: rnam par byang ba ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba ma yin /
translated: It is not inverted and it is not non-inverted.🔽It is not the same and it is not different.🔽It is not permanent and it is not annihilated.🔽It is not manifest and it is not unmanifest.

original: 'bri ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'bri ba ma yin /
translated: It is not grasped and it is not rejected.🔽It is not something to be accepted and it is not something to be abandoned.🔽It is not defiled and it is not purified.

original: 'phel ba @95b ma yin te /
analyzed: 'phel ba @95b ma yin te /
translated: It is not diminished and it is not increased.

original: phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste /
translated: It is not true and it is not false.🔽It is not real and it is not unreal.🔽It is not bound and it is not liberated.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o // de ltar na /
translated: It is not a cause and it is not a non-cause.🔽It is not a result and it is not a non-result.🔽It is not a phenomenon and it is not a non-phenomenon.

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin na //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin na //
translated: It is not a knower and it is not a non-knower.🔽It is not a seer and it is not a non-seer.🔽It is not a hearer and it is not a non-hearer.

original: ji ltar na /
analyzed: ji ltar na /
translated: It is not a smeller and it is not a non-smeller.🔽It is not a taster and it is not a non-taster.🔽It is not a feeler and it is not a non-feeler.🔽It is not a thinker and it is not a non-thinker.

original: 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: It is not a knower and it is not a non-knower.🔽It is not a creator and it is not a non-creator.🔽It is not a doer and it is not a non-doer.🔽It is not an agent and it is not a non-agent.🔽It is not a goer and it is not a non-goer.🔽It is not a speaker and it is not a non-speaker.🔽It is not a hearer and it is not a non-hearer.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / chu shing shun pa so sor phye na /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / chu shing shun pa so sor phye na /
translated: It is not a

original: snying po shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste /
analyzed: snying po shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste /
translated: It is to know that the essence is utterly unobservable.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: 'du byed shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: 'du byed shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: one knows conditioned phenomena.

original: 'du byed kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: “How do they know the arising and ceasing of conditioned phenomena?

original: 'du byed ni /
analyzed: 'du byed ni /
translated: Conditioned phenomena

original: gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing /
analyzed: gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing /
translated: do not come from anywhere

original: gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas /
analyzed: gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas /
translated: and do not go anywhere.

original: gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste /
translated: They do not come from anywhere and do not go anywhere.

original: gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste /
analyzed: gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste /
translated: They do not come from anywhere, and one knows that they do not go anywhere.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: 'du byed kya skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: 'du byed kya skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: one knows the arising and ceasing of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: “How do they know the suchness of conditioned phenomena?

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: The suchness of conditioned phenomena

original: mi skye / mi 'gag /🔽'ong ba med /
analyzed: mi skye / mi 'gag / 'ong ba med /
translated: is unborn and unceasing.

original: 'gro ba med /🔽kun nas nyon mongs ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'gro ba med / kun nas nyon mongs ba ma yin /
translated: It does not come and does not go.

original: rnam par byang ba ma yin /🔽'bri ba ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba ma yin / 'bri ba ma yin /
translated: It is not afflicted and is not purified.

original: 'phel ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'phel ba ma yin te /
translated: It does not diminish and does not increase.

original: phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste /
translated: It is not erroneous and abides as suchness.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called suchness.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: one understands the suchness of formations.

original: rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: How does one understand consciousness?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste /
translated: For example, it is like an illusory army of four divisions conjured up by a magician.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /🔽rnam par shes @96a *//
analyzed: rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no // ji ltar na / rnam par shes @96a *//
translated: one understands consciousness.

original: pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na /🔽rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na / rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: How does one understand the arising and cessation of consciousness?

original: gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing /
analyzed: gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing /
translated: Consciousness does not come from anywhere

original: gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas /
analyzed: gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas /
translated: and does not go anywhere.

original: gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste /
translated: It does not come from anywhere and does not go anywhere.

original: gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste /
analyzed: gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste /
translated: One understands that which does not come from anywhere and does not go anywhere.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no //
translated: one understands the arising and cessation of consciousness.

original: ji ltar na /
analyzed: ji ltar na /
translated: How does one understand the suchness of consciousness?

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: If you ask how consciousness is understood as suchness,

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: the suchness of consciousness

original: mi skye / mi 'gag /
analyzed: mi skye / mi 'gag /
translated: is unborn and unceasing,

original: 'ong ba med /
analyzed: 'ong ba med /
translated: not coming,

original: 'gro ba med /🔽kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'gro ba med / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
translated: not going,🔽not defiled,🔽not purified,

original: rnam par byang ba ma yin /🔽'bri ba ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba ma yin / 'bri ba ma yin /
translated: not diminished,

original: 'phel ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'phel ba ma yin te /
translated: and not increased.

original: phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste /
translated: It is not erroneous and abides as suchness.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called suchness.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: consciousness is understood as suchness.

original: skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na /🔽nang gi chos rnams ni /
analyzed: skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na / nang gi chos rnams ni /
translated: If you ask how the sense sources are understood,

original: nang gi chos rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: nang gi chos rnams kyis stong /
translated: inner phenomena are empty of inner phenomena,

original: phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste /
analyzed: phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste /
translated: and outer phenomena are empty of outer phenomena.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: skye mched rnams shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: skye mched rnams shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: the sense sources are understood.

original: khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: If you ask how the constituents are understood,

original: mig gi khams kyang mig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi khams kyang mig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The eye constituent is empty of the intrinsic nature of the eye constituent.

original: gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The form constituent is empty of the intrinsic nature of the form constituent.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The eye consciousness constituent is empty of the intrinsic nature of the eye consciousness constituent.

original: @96b rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: @96b rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The ear constituent is empty of the intrinsic nature of the ear constituent.

original: sgra'i khams kyang sgra'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sgra'i khams kyang sgra'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The sound constituent is empty of the intrinsic nature of the sound constituent.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The ear consciousness constituent is empty of the intrinsic nature of the ear consciousness constituent.🔽The nose constituent is empty of the intrinsic nature of the nose constituent.

original: dri'i khams kyang dri'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dri'i khams kyang dri'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The smell constituent is empty of the intrinsic nature of the smell constituent.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /
translated: the element of nose consciousness is empty of the intrinsic nature of the element of nose consciousness.

original: lce'i khams kyang lce'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i khams kyang lce'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The element of the tongue is empty of the intrinsic nature of the element of the tongue.

original: ro'i khams kyang ro'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ro'i khams kyang ro'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The element of tastes is empty of the intrinsic nature of the element of tastes.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The element of tongue consciousness is empty of the intrinsic nature of the element of tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi khams kyang lus kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi khams kyang lus kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The element of the body is empty of the intrinsic nature of the element of the body.

original: reg gi khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: reg gi khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The element of tangibles is empty of the intrinsic nature of the element of tangibles.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The element of body consciousness is empty of the intrinsic nature of the element of body consciousness.

original: yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The element of the mind is empty of the intrinsic nature of the element of the mind.🔽The element of mental objects is empty of the intrinsic nature of the element of mental objects.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The element of mental consciousness is empty of the intrinsic nature of the element of mental consciousness.

original: zhes bya bar shes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya bar shes pa ste /
translated: Thus it is known.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: khams rnams shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: khams rnams shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: the elements are known.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes @97a *//🔽pa yin zhe na /🔽rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / don gcig ba ma yin pa dang /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes @97a *// pa yin zhe na / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / don gcig ba ma yin pa dang /
translated: “How is dependent origination known?🔽Dependent origination is known to be unborn, and likewise dependent origination is known to be unceasing, not annihilated, not permanent, not identical, not different, not coming, not going, free from mental proliferation, and peaceful.

original: don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa de ltar na; rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa de ltar na; rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: In this way, dependent origination is known.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: “How are the noble truths known?

original: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin /
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin /
translated: It is the knowledge of the noble truth of suffering.

original: kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te /🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te / ji ltar na /
translated: It is the knowledge of the noble truth of the origin, of the noble truth of the cessation, and of the noble truth of the path that leads to cessation.

original: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it the knowledge of the noble truth of suffering?

original: sdug bsngal shes pa yin /
analyzed: sdug bsngal shes pa yin /
translated: It is the knowledge of suffering.

original: bden pa shes pa yin /
analyzed: bden pa shes pa yin /
translated: It is the knowledge of the truth.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin /
translated: It is the knowledge of the noble truth.

original: gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste /
translated: It is the noble truth that is free from duality.

original: gnyis su med pa ni /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa ni /
translated: Non-duality

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no //
translated: is known as the noble truth.

original: de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te /
translated: Similarly, it is the knowledge of the noble truth of the origin, of the noble truth of the cessation, and of the noble truth of the path that leads to cessation.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no //🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no // ji ltar na /
translated: it is the knowledge of the noble truths.

original: sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it the knowledge of the suchness of suffering?

original: sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: The suchness of suffering

original: ma nor ba shes bya bar shes pa yin no //
analyzed: ma nor ba shes bya bar shes pa yin no //
translated: It is the knowledge of the way things really are.

original: @97b de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa yin te /
analyzed: @97b de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa yin te /
translated: Similarly, he knows the suchness of the arising, the suchness of the cessation, and the suchness of the path.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no //
translated: he knows the suchness of the noble truths.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Su­bhūti said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'tshal na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'tshal na /
translated: if bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom in this way know those phenomena that are mutually distinct,

original: des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrug par mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrug par mi 'gyur ram /
translated: will they not disturb the realm of phenomena?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: rab 'byor / gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni /
translated: “Su­bhūti, if there were any phenomena that were not included in the realm of phenomena,

original: rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur te /
translated: then they would be disturbed.

original: rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, no other phenomenon whatsoever is observed apart from the dharma-constituent.

original: gal te dmigs na ni /
analyzed: gal te dmigs na ni /
translated: If it were observed,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the dharma-constituent would be disturbed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?🔽Subhūti, no phenomenon whatsoever is observed apart from the dharma-constituent—

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa'am /
translated: whether a tathāgata,

original: byang chub sems dpa'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'am /
translated: a bodhisattva,

original: rang sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas sam /
translated: a pratyekabuddha,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so //🔽de ltar ma dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so // de ltar ma dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no //
translated: or a śrāvaka of the Tathāgata.

original: zhes bya bar btags pa med do //
analyzed: zhes bya bar btags pa med do //
translated: Since it is not observed in that way, there is no designation of ‘another phenomenon apart from the dharma-constituent.’

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos kyi dbyings la @98a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos kyi dbyings la @98a *//
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom in that way should train in the dharma-constituent.

original: bslab par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: bslab par bya'o // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: ”🔽Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la bslab par 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la bslab par 'gyur /
translated: “Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings train in the expanse of reality, what do they train in?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who practice in the expanse of reality

original: chos thams cad la bslab par 'gyur te /
analyzed: chos thams cad la bslab par 'gyur te /
translated: train in all phenomena.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
translated: Subhūti, it is because all phenomena

original: chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: are the expanse of reality.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” Subhūti then asked,

original: ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags /
translated: “Blessed One, why are all phenomena the expanse of reality?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: ma byung yang rung ste /
analyzed: ma byung yang rung ste /
translated: “Subhūti, whether or not the thus-gone ones have appeared,🔽the expanse of reality of phenomena remains just as it is,

original: dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni; de bzhin du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni; de bzhin du gnas pa ste /
translated: in a manner that is indivisible.

original: rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings de ni /
translated: Subhūti, that expanse of reality

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: is this:

original: dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dang /
analyzed: dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dang /
translated: the wholesome and the unwholesome, the mundane and the supramundane, the contaminated and the uncontaminated, the reprehensible and the irreproachable,

original: 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad de /
analyzed: 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad de /
translated: all conditioned and unconditioned phenomena,

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, in this way

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos kyi dbyings la slob pas chos thams cad la bslab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos kyi dbyings la slob pas chos thams cad la bslab par 'gyur ro //
translated: the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, by training in the dharma-constituent, train in all phenomena.”

original: gsol pa / bcom @98b ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom @98b ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Blessed One,

original: gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na /
analyzed: gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na /
translated: if all phenomena are the dharma-constituent,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi /
translated: how should the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom train in form?

original: ji ltar tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in feeling?

original: ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in perception?

original: ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in mental formations?

original: ji ltar rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in consciousness?

original: ji ltar khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in the elements and sense bases and dependent origination?

original: ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in the perfection of generosity?

original: ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in the perfection of moral discipline?

original: ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in the perfection of patience?

original: ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in the perfection of diligence?

original: ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in the perfection of concentration?

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /🔽ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in the perfection of wisdom?🔽How should we train in inner emptiness?

original: ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in outer emptiness?

original: ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in external emptiness?

original: ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the emptiness of emptiness?

original: ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the emptiness of great extent?

original: ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /🔽ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the emptiness of ultimate reality?🔽How should they train in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena?

original: ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /🔽ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /🔽ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab @99a *//
analyzed: ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab @99a *//
translated: How should they train in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena?🔽How should they train in the emptiness of beyond extremes?🔽How should they train in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless?

original: par bgyi / ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: par bgyi / ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the emptiness of what is not to be discarded?

original: ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the emptiness of inherent existence?

original: ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the emptiness of all phenomena?

original: ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the emptiness of its own characteristics?

original: ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the emptiness of non-apprehension?

original: ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the emptiness of non-entities?

original: ji ltar ngo bo nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar ngo bo nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the essence?

original: ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the emptiness of the essence of non-entities?

original: ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the four establishments of mindfulness?

original: ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the four right efforts?

original: ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the four legs of miraculous power?

original: ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the five faculties?

original: ji ltar stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the five powers?

original: ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the seven branches of enlightenment?

original: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi /🔽ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the noble eightfold path?🔽How should they train in the four noble truths?

original: ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the four concentrations?

original: ji ltar tshad med pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar tshad med pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the four immeasurables?

original: ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the four formless absorptions?

original: ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the eight aspects of liberation?

original: ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the nine serial steps of meditative absorption?

original: ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma @99b med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma @99b med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the emptiness aspect of the gateway to liberation, in the absence of attributes aspect of the gateway to liberation, and in the absence of expectancy aspect of the gateway to liberation?

original: ji ltar mngon par shes pa drug la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par shes pa drug la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the six forms of supernatural knowledge?

original: ji ltar ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in all the meditative stabilities?

original: ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in all the dhāraṇī gateways?

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the ten powers of the tathāgatas?

original: ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the four forms of fearlessness?

original: ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi; ji ltar byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi; ji ltar byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in the four correct discriminations?🔽How should we train in great love?

original: ji ltar snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in great compassion?

original: ji ltar dga' ba chen po la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar dga' ba chen po la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in great joy?

original: ji ltar btang snyoms chen po la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar btang snyoms chen po la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in great equanimity?

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha?

original: ji ltar mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in accomplishing the thirty-two major marks and eighty minor marks of a great being?

original: ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in being born into a great and noble family?

original: ji ltar bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in being born into a great and noble brahmin family?

original: ji ltar khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train in being born into a great and noble householder family?

original: ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should I train to be reborn among the gods of the Heaven of the Four Great Kings?

original: ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /🔽ji ltar mtshe ma'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /🔽ji ltar dga' ldan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar mtshe ma'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar dga' ldan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should I train to be reborn among the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three?🔽How should I train to be reborn among the gods of the Yāma Heaven?🔽How should I train to be reborn among the gods of the Tuṣita Heaven?

original: ji ltar 'phrul dga'i ltar skye bar bgyi @100a *//🔽ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar 'phrul dga'i ltar skye bar bgyi @100a *// ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should I train to be reborn among the gods of the Nirmāṇarati Heaven?

original: ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /🔽ji ltar tshangs ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /🔽ji ltar tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar tshangs ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should I train to be reborn among the gods of the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin Heaven?🔽How should I train to be reborn among the gods of the Brahmakāyika Heaven?🔽How should I train to be reborn among the gods of the Brahmapurohita Heaven?

original: ji ltar tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should I train to be reborn among the gods of the Brahmapārṣadya Heaven?

original: ji ltar tshangs chen gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar tshangs chen gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should I train to be reborn among the gods of the Mahābrahmāṇa Heaven?

original: ji ltar chung snang gi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /🔽ji ltar tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar chung snang gi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of Limited Radiance?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of Immeasurable Radiance?

original: ji ltar kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab bar bgyi /🔽ji ltar chung dge'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab bar bgyi / ji ltar chung dge'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of Luminous Radiance?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of Limited Virtue?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of Immeasurable Virtue?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of Perfected Virtue?

original: ji ltar tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /🔽ji ltar dge rgyas kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar dge rgyas kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of Limited Bliss?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of Immeasurable Bliss?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of Blissful Emanations?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of No Hardship?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of Great Reward?

original: ji ltar chung che'i lhar skye bar bgyi pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar chung che'i lhar skye bar bgyi pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of the Highest Peak?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of the Four Kings?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of the Thirty-Three?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven Free from Strife?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of Joy?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of Delighting in Emanations?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of Making Use of Others’ Emanations?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of the Highest Pinnacle of Existence?

original: ji ltar tshad med che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi; ji ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar tshad med che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi; ji ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of the Four Concentrations?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of the Five Destinies?

original: ji ltar 'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar 'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of the Five Destinies of the Formless Realm?🔽How should we train to be born as a god in the Heaven of the Five Destinies of the Formless Realm?

original: ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi /
translated: How should they train to be born in the pure realms, and not be born there?🔽How should they train to be born as gods in the sense field of infinite space, and not be born there?

original: ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar @100b bgyi; ji ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar @100b bgyi; ji ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi /
translated: How should they train to be born as gods in the sense field of infinite consciousness, and not be born there?

original: ji ltar cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi /
translated: How should they train to be born as gods in the sense field of nothingness, and not be born there?

original: ji ltar 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi /

analyzed: ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi /

analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi /

analyzed: ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la bslabs shing chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi @101a *//

original: lam la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: lam la bslab par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the bodhisattva path in order to train in the bodhisattva path that is to know all phenomena in all aspects?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: lus la bslab par bgyi /

analyzed: yid la bslab par bgyi /

analyzed: gzugs la bslab par bgyi /

translated: they should train in tastes,🔽they should train in tangibles,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi /

translated: One should train in the composite of eye contact.🔽One should train in the composite of ear contact.🔽One should train in the composite of nose contact.

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i @101b rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i @101b rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /

analyzed: sa'i khams la bslab par bgyi /

analyzed: chu'i khams la bslab par bgyi /

original: me'i khams la bslab par bgyi /🔽rlung gi khams la bslab par bgyi /

original: nam mkha'i khams la bslab par bgyi /

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la bslab par bgyi /

original: ma rig pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ma rig pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: One should train in ignorance.

original: 'du byed la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: 'du byed la bslab par bgyi /
translated: One should train in volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: One should train in consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs la bslab par bgyi /

original: skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi /

original: reg pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: reg pa la bslab par bgyi /

original: tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: tshor ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: One should train in feeling.

original: sred pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: sred pa la bslab par bgyi /

original: len pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: len pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in grasping,

original: srid pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: srid pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in existence,

original: skye ba la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: skye ba la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in birth,

original: rga shi la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: rga shi la bslab par bgyi /

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the perfection of moral discipline,🔽one should train in the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /
