original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi /🔽nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi / nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the perfection of wisdom,🔽one should train in inner emptiness,

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /

original: @102a *// phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: @102a *// phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /

original: chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: One should train in the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽One should train in the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: One should train in the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽One should train in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽One should train in the emptiness of what is without beginning or end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: One should train in the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: One should train in the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽One should train in the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: One should train in the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽One should train in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: One should train in the emptiness of non-entities.🔽One should train in the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: One should train in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: One should train in the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the four right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /🔽dbang po rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bgyi / dbang po rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the four legs of manifestation,🔽one should train in the five faculties,

original: stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi /

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the seven aspects of enlightenment,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the eightfold noble path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the immeasurables,

original: gzugs med @102b pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: gzugs med @102b pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the eight deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the nine serial absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors of liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: one should train in the clairvoyances,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: “We should train in the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: We should train in the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: We should train in the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: We should train in the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /🔽byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bgyi / byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi /
translated: We should train in the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽We should train in great love.

original: snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi /
translated: We should train in great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /
translated: We should train in the distinct attributes of the buddhas.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi /
translated: We should train in the result of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi /
translated: We should train in the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi /🔽dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi / dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: We should train in the result of non-returner.🔽We should train in the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi /
translated: We should train in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi /
translated: We should train in the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyi na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyi na /
translated: We should train in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa'am /
analyzed: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa'am /
translated: For what reason, then, would a bodhisattva great being not engage in error,

original: mi spro ba spros par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags grang ////
analyzed: mi spro ba spros par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags grang ////
translated: or not engage in the proliferation of what is not to be proliferated?”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //🔽bam po nyis brgya gya @103a *//
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa // bam po nyis brgya gya @103a *//
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines🔽Volume 244

original: bzhi pa // bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bzhi pa // bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: why is that?

original: chos kyi dbyings la ni /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la ni /
translated: In the dharma-constituent

original: rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te /🔽gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te / gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: those conceptual thoughts do not exist.🔽Form is not the dharma-constituent,

original: gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: and apart from form the dharma-constituent does not exist.🔽Form itself is the dharma-constituent,

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so //
translated: and the dharma-constituent itself is form.

original: tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: Feeling is not the dharma-constituent,

original: tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: and apart from feeling the dharma-constituent does not exist.🔽Feeling itself is the dharma-constituent,

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
translated: and the dharma-constituent itself is feeling.

original: 'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: 'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: Perception is not the dharma-constituent.

original: 'du shes las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: 'du shes las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from perception, there is no dharma-constituent.🔽Perception itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so //🔽'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so // 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is perception.🔽Formations are not the dharma-constituent.

original: 'du byed las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: 'du byed las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from formations, there is no dharma-constituent.🔽Formations themselves are the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do //🔽rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do // rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is formations.🔽Consciousness is not the dharma-constituent.

original: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from consciousness, there is no dharma-constituent.🔽Consciousness itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //🔽mig kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o // mig kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is consciousness.🔽The eyes are not the dharma-constituent.

original: mig las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: mig las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the eyes, there is no dharma-constituent.

original: mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The eyes themselves are the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go /🔽rna ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go / rna ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The eye is the expanse of reality.🔽The ear is not the expanse of reality.

original: rna @103b ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rna @103b ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is not other than the ear.🔽The ear itself is the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o //🔽sna'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o // sna'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The expanse of reality itself is the ear.🔽The nose is not the expanse of reality.

original: sna las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: sna las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is not other than the nose.🔽The nose itself is the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o //🔽lce'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o // lce'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The expanse of reality itself is the nose.🔽The tongue is not the expanse of reality.

original: lce las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: lce las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is not other than the tongue.🔽The tongue itself is the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o //🔽lus kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o // lus kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The expanse of reality itself is the tongue.🔽The body is not the expanse of reality.

original: lus las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: lus las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is not other than the body.🔽The body itself is the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so //
translated: The expanse of reality itself is the body.

original: yid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: yid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The mind is not the dharmadhātu.

original: yid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: yid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the mind, there is no dharmadhātu.🔽The mind itself is the dharmadhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do //🔽gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do // gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharmadhātu itself is the mind.🔽Form is not the dharmadhātu.

original: gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from form, there is no dharmadhātu.🔽Form itself is the dharmadhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so //🔽sgra'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so // sgra'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharmadhātu itself is form.🔽Sound is not the dharmadhātu.

original: sgra las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: sgra las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from sound, there is no dharmadhātu.🔽Sound itself is the dharmadhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o //🔽dri la chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o // dri la chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharmadhātu itself is sound.🔽Smell is not the dharmadhātu.

original: dri las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: dri las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from smell, there is no dharmadhātu.🔽Smell itself is the dharmadhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o //
translated: The dharmadhātu itself is smell.

original: ro'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: ro'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: Taste is not the dharmadhātu.

original: ro las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis @104a *//🔽te; ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: ro las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis @104a *// te; ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than taste,🔽and taste itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o //🔽reg kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o // reg kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is taste.🔽Touch is not the realm of phenomena,

original: reg las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: reg las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: and the realm of phenomena is not other than touch,🔽and touch itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go /🔽chos kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go / chos kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is touch.🔽Phenomena are not the realm of phenomena,

original: chos las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: chos las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: and the realm of phenomena is not other than phenomena,

original: chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so; ;chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so //
analyzed: chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so; ;chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so //
translated: and phenomena themselves are the realm of phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The eye consciousness is not the realm of phenomena,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: and the realm of phenomena is not other than the eye consciousness,🔽and the eye consciousness itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The ear consciousness is not the realm of phenomena.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the ear consciousness, there is no realm of phenomena.🔽The ear consciousness itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the ear consciousness.🔽The nose consciousness is not the realm of phenomena.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa las gung na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the nose consciousness, there is no realm of phenomena.🔽The nose consciousness itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o // lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the nose consciousness.🔽The tongue consciousness is not the realm of phenomena.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the tongue consciousness, there is no realm of phenomena.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa @104b nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa @104b nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The tongue consciousness itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: the tongue consciousness is the realm of phenomena.🔽The body consciousness is not the realm of phenomena.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the body consciousness, there is no realm of phenomena.🔽The body consciousness itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o //🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the body consciousness.🔽The mind consciousness is not the realm of phenomena.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the mind consciousness, there is no realm of phenomena.🔽The mind consciousness itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the mind consciousness.🔽The sensory element of the eyes is not the realm of phenomena.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the sensory element of the eyes, there is no realm of phenomena.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The contact of the eye is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the contact of the eye.🔽The contact of the ear is not the realm of phenomena.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the contact of the ear.🔽The contact of the ear is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the contact of the ear.🔽The contact of the nose is not the realm of phenomena.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the contact of the nose.🔽The contact of the nose is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang @105a *//🔽chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang @105a *// chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the contact of the nose.🔽The contact of the tongue is not the realm of phenomena.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the contact of the tongue.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The contact of the tongue is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the contact of the tongue.🔽The contact of the body is also not the realm of phenomena.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the contact of the body.🔽The contact of the body is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the contact of the body.🔽The contact of the mind is also not the realm of phenomena.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the contact of the mind.🔽The contact of the mind is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the contact of the mind.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the eye is also not the realm of phenomena.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The domain of phenomena is not other than the feeling that arises from the condition of the convergence of eye, form, and the relevant consciousness.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the convergence of eye, form, and the relevant consciousness is the domain of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The domain of phenomena is the feeling that arises from the condition of the convergence of eye, form, and the relevant consciousness.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the convergence of ear, sound, and the relevant consciousness is not the domain of phenomena.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The domain of phenomena is not other than the feeling that arises from the condition of the convergence of ear, sound, and the relevant consciousness.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the convergence of ear, sound, and the relevant consciousness is the domain of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna @105b ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna @105b ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: The domain of phenomena is the feeling that arises from the condition of the convergence of ear, sound, and the relevant consciousness.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the convergence of nose, smell, and the relevant consciousness is not the domain of phenomena.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The domain of phenomena is not other than the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of nose, smell, and the consciousness that is aware of smell.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the union of nose, smell, and the consciousness that is aware of smell is itself the domain of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The domain of phenomena itself is the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of nose, smell, and the consciousness that is aware of smell.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue, taste, and the consciousness that is aware of taste is not the domain of phenomena.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The domain of phenomena is not other than the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue, taste, and the consciousness that is aware of taste.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue, taste, and the consciousness that is aware of taste is itself the domain of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: The domain of phenomena itself is the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue, taste, and the consciousness that is aware of taste.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the union of body, touch, and the consciousness that is aware of touch is not the domain of phenomena.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of body.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of body is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of body.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mind is not the realm of phenomena.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mind.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mind is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor @106a *//🔽ba'o; ;sa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor @106a *// ba'o; ;sa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of mind.🔽The earth element is not the realm of phenomena.

original: sa'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: sa'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the earth element.

original: sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The earth element itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so //🔽chu'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so // chu'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is the earth element.🔽The water element is not the dharma-dhātu.

original: chu'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chu'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Nor is the dharma-dhātu to be found apart from the water element.🔽The water element itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so //🔽me'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so // me'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is the water element.🔽The fire element is not the dharma-dhātu.

original: me'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: me'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Nor is the dharma-dhātu to be found apart from the fire element.🔽The fire element itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so //🔽rlung gi khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so // rlung gi khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is the fire element.🔽The wind element is not the dharma-dhātu.

original: rlung gi khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rlung gi khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Nor is the dharma-dhātu to be found apart from the wind element.🔽The wind element itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: the space element is not the dharma-constituent,

original: nam mkha'i khams las skyed na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams las skyed na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: and apart from the space element there is no dharma-constituent.🔽The space element itself is the dharma-constituent,

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so //
translated: and the dharma-constituent itself is the space element.🔽The consciousness element is not the dharma-constituent,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags; rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags; rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: and apart from the consciousness element there is no dharma-constituent.🔽The consciousness element itself is the dharma-constituent,

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par @106b shes pa'i khams so //🔽ma rig pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par @106b shes pa'i khams so // ma rig pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: and the dharma-constituent itself is the consciousness element.🔽Ignorance is not the dharma-constituent,

original: ma rig pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: ma rig pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: and apart from ignorance there is no dharma-constituent.🔽Ignorance itself is the dharma-constituent,

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //
translated: and the dharma-constituent itself is ignorance.

original: 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: Formations are not the dharma-constituent,

original: 'du byed las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: 'du byed las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharmadhātu is not other than formations.🔽Formations themselves are the dharmadhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do //🔽rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do // rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharmadhātu itself is formations.🔽Consciousness is not the dharmadhātu.

original: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharmadhātu is not other than consciousness.🔽Consciousness itself is the dharmadhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //🔽ming dang gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o // ming dang gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharmadhātu itself is consciousness.🔽Name and form are not the dharmadhātu.

original: ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharmadhātu is not other than name and form.🔽Name and form themselves are the dharmadhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so //🔽skye mched drug kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so // skye mched drug kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharmadhātu itself is name and form.🔽The six sense sources are not the dharmadhātu.

original: skye mched drug las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: skye mched drug las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: The dharmadhātu is not other than the six sense sources.

original: skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The six sense sources are the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go /🔽reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go / reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the six sense sources.🔽Contact is not the realm of phenomena.

original: reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than contact.🔽Contact is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o //🔽tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o // tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena is contact.🔽Sensation is not the realm of phenomena.

original: tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽tshor ba nyid kyang @107a *//🔽chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / tshor ba nyid kyang @107a *// chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than sensation.🔽Sensation is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o //🔽sred pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o // sred pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena is sensation.🔽Craving is not the realm of phenomena.

original: sred pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: sred pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than craving.🔽Craving is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o //
translated: The realm of phenomena is craving.

original: len pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: len pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: Clinging is not the realm of phenomena.

original: len pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: len pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than appropriation.🔽Appropriation itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o //🔽srid pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o // srid pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is appropriation.🔽Existence is not the realm of phenomena.

original: srid pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: srid pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than existence.🔽Existence itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o //🔽skye ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o // skye ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is existence.🔽Birth is not the realm of phenomena.

original: skye ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: skye ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than birth.🔽Birth itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o //🔽rga shi'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o // rga shi'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is birth.🔽Aging and death are not the realm of phenomena.

original: rga shi las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rga shi las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than aging and death.🔽Aging and death itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is aging and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The perfection of generosity is not the dharma-constituent.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the perfection of generosity, there is no dharma-constituent.🔽The perfection of generosity itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the perfection of generosity.🔽The perfection of moral discipline is not the dharma-constituent.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @107b las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @107b las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the perfection of moral discipline, there is no dharma-constituent.🔽The perfection of moral discipline itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the perfection of moral discipline.🔽The perfection of patience is not the dharma-constituent.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the perfection of patience, there is no dharma-constituent.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The perfection of patience itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is the perfection of patience.🔽The perfection of perseverance is not the dharma-dhātu.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Nor is the dharma-dhātu to be found anywhere else apart from the perfection of perseverance.🔽The perfection of perseverance itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The perfection of concentration is not the dharma-dhātu.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Nor is the dharma-dhātu to be found anywhere else apart from the perfection of concentration.🔽The perfection of concentration itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is not other than the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The perfection of wisdom itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /🔽nang stong pa @108a *//
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags / nang stong pa @108a *//
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the perfection of wisdom.🔽The emptiness of internal phenomena is not the dharma-constituent.

original: nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-constituent is not other than the emptiness of internal phenomena.🔽The emptiness of internal phenomena itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do //🔽phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do // phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the emptiness of internal phenomena.🔽The emptiness of external phenomena is not the dharma-constituent.

original: phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: The dharma-constituent is not other than the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The emptiness of external phenomena itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of the external.🔽The emptiness of the external and the internal is also not the expanse of reality.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the emptiness of the external and the internal, there is also no expanse of reality.🔽The emptiness of the external and the internal is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do //🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of the external and the internal.🔽The emptiness of emptiness is also not the expanse of reality.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of emptiness, there is also no expanse of reality.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //🔽chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do // chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the great is also not the expanse of reality.

original: chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the emptiness of the great, there is also no expanse of reality.

original: chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The emptiness of the great is also the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do // don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of the great.🔽The emptiness of the ultimate is also not the dharma-constituent.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the emptiness of the ultimate, there is also no dharma-constituent.🔽The emptiness of the ultimate is also the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do //🔽'dus byas @108b stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do // 'dus byas @108b stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽The emptiness of the compounded is also not the dharma-constituent.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / 'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the emptiness of the compounded, there is also no dharma-constituent.🔽The emptiness of the compounded is also the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of the compounded.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the uncompounded is also not the dharma-constituent.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is not other than the emptiness of the uncompounded.🔽The emptiness of the uncompounded is the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The expanse of reality is the emptiness of the uncompounded.🔽The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not the expanse of reality.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: The expanse of reality is not other than the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The expanse of reality is the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not the expanse of reality.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: The expanse of reality is not other than the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness that is beginningless and endless.🔽The emptiness of nonrejection is also not the expanse of reality.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the emptiness of nonrejection, there is no expanse of reality.🔽The emptiness of nonrejection itself is the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings @109a *//
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings @109a *//
translated: The expanse of reality itself is the emptiness of nonrejection.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is also not the expanse of reality.

original: ma lags / rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: ma lags / rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the emptiness of inherent existence, there is no expanse of reality.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence itself is the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The expanse of reality itself is the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is also not the expanse of reality.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / chos thams cad stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is not other than the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is itself the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The expanse of reality is itself the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of defining characteristics is not the expanse of reality.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is not other than the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽The emptiness of defining characteristics is itself the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The expanse of reality is itself the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is not the expanse of reality.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: The expanse of reality is not other than the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so; ;chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so; ;chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //🔽chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so // chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /🔽@109b ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags / @109b ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not the dharma-constituent.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature there is no dharma-constituent.🔽The emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is itself the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not the dharma-constituent.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the applications of mindfulness there is no dharma-constituent.🔽The applications of mindfulness are themselves the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so //
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The right efforts are not the dharma-constituent.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the correct abandonments.🔽The correct abandonments are the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the correct abandonments.🔽The bases of miraculous powers are not the realm of phenomena.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the bases of miraculous powers.🔽The bases of miraculous powers are the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //🔽dbang po rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so // dbang po rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the bases of miraculous powers.🔽The faculties are not the realm of phenomena.

original: dbang po rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings @110a *//🔽ma mchis te /🔽dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: dbang po rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings @110a *// ma mchis te / dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the faculties.🔽The faculties are the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the faculties.

original: stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The powers are not the realm of phenomena.

original: stobs rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: stobs rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharmadhātu is not other than the powers.🔽The powers are the dharmadhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so //
translated: The dharmadhātu is the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags; byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags; byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The limbs of awakening are not the dharmadhātu, nor is the dharmadhātu other than the limbs of awakening.🔽The limbs of awakening are the dharmadhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //🔽lam yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so // lam yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharmadhātu is the limbs of awakening.🔽The path is not the dharmadhātu,

original: lam las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽lam nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: lam las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / lam nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: nor is the dharmadhātu other than the path.🔽The path is the dharmadhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam mo //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam mo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharmadhātu is the path.🔽The noble truths are not the dharmadhātu,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: nor is the dharmadhātu other than the noble truths.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The noble truths are also the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //🔽bsam gtan rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so // bsam gtan rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-dhātu is also the noble truths.🔽The dhyānas are also not the dharma-dhātu.

original: bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-dhātu is also not other than the dhyānas.🔽The dhyānas are also the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so //🔽tshad med pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so // tshad med pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-dhātu is also the dhyānas.🔽The immeasurables are also not the dharma-dhātu.

original: tshad @110b med pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: tshad @110b med pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-dhātu is also not other than the immeasurables.🔽The immeasurables are also the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-dhātu is also the immeasurables.🔽The formless absorptions are also not the dharma-dhātu.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: The dharma-dhātu is also not other than the formless absorptions.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The formless absorptions are the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
translated: The expanse of reality is the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The liberations are not the expanse of reality.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Nor is the expanse of reality to be found anywhere else apart from the liberations.🔽The liberations are the expanse of reality.
