original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The expanse of reality is the liberations.🔽The meditative absorptions are not the expanse of reality.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Nor is the expanse of reality to be found anywhere else apart from the meditative absorptions.🔽The meditative absorptions are the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
translated: The expanse of reality is the meditative absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates of liberation are not the dharma-constituent.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang @111a *//🔽chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang @111a *// chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-constituent is not other than the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates of liberation.🔽The emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates of liberation are the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //🔽mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o // mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates of liberation.🔽The clairvoyances are not the dharma-constituent.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: The dharma-constituent is not other than the clairvoyances.

original: mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The clairvoyances themselves are the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so // ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are also the realm of phenomena.🔽The dhāraṇī gateways are not other than the realm of phenomena.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽The dhāraṇī gateways are the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so // gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽The strengths of the tathāgatas are not the realm of phenomena.🔽The strengths of the tathāgatas are not other than the realm of phenomena.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the strengths of the tathāgatas.🔽The strengths of the tathāgatas are the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The realm of phenomena is the strengths of the tathāgatas.🔽The strengths of the tathāgatas are not the realm of phenomena.🔽The strengths of the tathāgatas are not other than the realm of phenomena.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: The realm of phenomena is not other than the strengths of the tathāgatas.🔽The strengths of the tathāgatas are the realm of phenomena.🔽The realm of phenomena is the strengths of the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are also the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs @111b rnams so //🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs @111b rnams so // mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is the powers of the tathāgatas.🔽The fearlessnesses are not the dharma-dhātu.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Nor is the dharma-dhātu to be found apart from the fearlessnesses.🔽The fearlessnesses themselves are the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is the fearlessnesses.🔽The detailed and thorough knowledges are not the dharma-dhātu.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Nor is the dharma-dhātu to be found apart from the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽The detailed and thorough knowledges themselves are the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so //
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: byams pa chen po'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: Great love is not the dharma-dhātu.

original: byams pa chen po las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: byams pa chen po las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The great love is not other than the dharma-constituent.🔽The great love itself is the dharma-constitution.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o //🔽snying rje chen po'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o // snying rje chen po'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the great love.🔽The great compassion is not the dharma-constituent.

original: snying rje chen po las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The great compassion is not other than the dharma-constituent.🔽The great compassion itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the great compassion.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not the dharma-constituent.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not other than the dharma-constituent.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /🔽rgyun du zhugs @112a *//
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags / rgyun du zhugs @112a *//
translated: The result of stream enterer is not the dharma-constituent.

original: pa'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: pa'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the result of stream enterer there is no dharma-constituent.🔽The result of stream enterer itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the result of stream enterer.🔽The result of once-returner is not the dharma-constituent.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the result of once-returner there is no dharma-constituent.🔽The result of once-returner itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the result of once-returner.🔽The result of non-returner is not the dharma-constituent.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the result of non-returner there is no dharma-constituent.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: the fruit of non-returning is the dharma-dhātu;

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o // dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: the fruit of non-returning is itself the dharma-dhātu.🔽Arhatship is not the dharma-dhātu;

original: dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: the dharma-dhātu is not other than arhatship;🔽arhatship is itself the dharma-dhātu;

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so; ;chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do //🔽rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so; ;chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do // rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: the dharma-dhātu is itself arhatship.🔽Individual enlightenment is not the dharma-dhātu;

original: rang byang chub las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rang byang chub las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: the dharma-dhātu is not other than individual enlightenment;🔽individual enlightenment is itself the dharma-dhātu;

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo //🔽lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: the dharma-dhātu is itself individual enlightenment.🔽The knowledge of path aspects is not the dharma-dhātu;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang @112b chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang @112b chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /
translated: the dharma-dhātu is not other than the knowledge of path aspects;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The knowledge of path aspects is also the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the knowledge of path aspects.🔽The knowledge of all aspects is also the dharma-constituent.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Apart from the knowledge of all aspects there is no dharma-constituent.🔽The knowledge of all aspects itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //🔽de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no // de de bzhin te /
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!🔽It is just as you have said.

original: ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no //🔽gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no // gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: It is just as you have said.🔽Form itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so //🔽tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so // tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is form.🔽Feeling itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is feeling.

original: 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Perception itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so //🔽'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so // 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is perception.🔽Formations themselves are the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do //🔽rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do // rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is formations.🔽Consciousness itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //🔽mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o // mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is consciousness.🔽The eyes themselves are the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go /🔽rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go / rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the eyes.🔽The ears themselves are the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o //🔽sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o // sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the ears.🔽The nose itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o //🔽lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o // lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the nose.🔽The tongue itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the tongue.

original: lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //🔽chos kyi @113a *//
analyzed: lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so // chos kyi @113a *//
translated: The body itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: dbyings nyid kyang lus so //
analyzed: dbyings nyid kyang lus so //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the body.

original: yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The mind itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do //🔽gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do // gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also the mind.🔽Form is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so //🔽sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so // sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also form.🔽Sound is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o //🔽dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o // dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also sound.🔽Smell is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o //🔽ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o // ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also smell.🔽Taste is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o //🔽reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o // reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also taste.🔽Touch is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go /
translated: The realm of phenomena is also touch.

original: chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Phenomena are also the realm of phenomena.🔽The realm of phenomena is also phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so; ;mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so; ;mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Eye consciousness is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so; ;chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so; ;chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The ear consciousness itself is the realm of phenomena, and the realm of phenomena itself is the ear consciousness.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o // lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The nose consciousness itself is the realm of phenomena, and the realm of phenomena itself is the nose consciousness.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o // lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The tongue consciousness itself is the realm of phenomena, and the realm of phenomena itself is the tongue consciousness.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o //🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o // yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The body consciousness itself is the realm of phenomena, and the realm of phenomena itself is the body consciousness.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang @113b chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang @113b chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The mind consciousness itself is the realm of phenomena, and the realm of phenomena itself is the mind consciousness.🔽The eye contact itself is the realm of phenomena, and the realm of phenomena itself is eye contact.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: The ear contact itself is the realm of phenomena, and the realm of phenomena itself is ear contact.🔽The nose contact itself is the realm of phenomena, and the realm of phenomena itself is nose contact.🔽The tongue contact itself is the realm of phenomena, and the realm of phenomena itself is tongue contact.🔽The body contact itself is the realm of phenomena, and the realm of phenomena itself is body contact.🔽The mind contact itself is the realm of phenomena, and the realm of phenomena itself is mind contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The contact that is the coming together of ear and sound is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the contact that is the coming together of ear and sound.🔽The contact that is the coming together of nose and smell is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o // lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the contact that is the coming together of nose and smell.🔽The contact that is the coming together of tongue and taste is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the contact that is the coming together of tongue and taste.🔽The contact that is the coming together of body and touch is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the contact that is the coming together of body and touch.🔽The contact that is the coming together of mind and mental phenomena is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the contact that is the coming together of mind and mental phenomena.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of eye, form, and eye consciousness is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The sense field of phenomena is also the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the eye, a visible object, and eye consciousness.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //🔽chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so // chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The sense field of phenomena is also the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the ear, a sound, and ear consciousness.🔽The sense field of phenomena is also the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the nose, a smell, and nose consciousness.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: The sense field of phenomena is also the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the tongue, a taste, and tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The sense field of phenomena is also the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the body, a tangible object, and body consciousness.🔽The sense field of phenomena is also the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the coming together of the mind, a mental object, and mind consciousness.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang @114a *//
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang @114a *//
translated: “The sense field of phenomena is also the eye.🔽The sense field of phenomena is also the ear.🔽The sense field of phenomena is also the nose.🔽The sense field of phenomena is also the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: The sense field of phenomena is also the body.🔽The sense field of phenomena is also the mind.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The condition of contact through the coming together of the mental faculty is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the condition of contact through the coming together of the mental faculty.🔽The earth element itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so //🔽chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so // chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the earth element.🔽The water element itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so //🔽me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so // me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the water element.🔽The fire element itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so //🔽rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so // rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the fire element.🔽The wind element itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //🔽nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so // nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the wind element.🔽The space element itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so //
translated: The realm of phenomena itself is the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The consciousness element itself is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so //🔽ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so // ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also the consciousness element.🔽Ignorance is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //🔽'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o // 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also ignorance.🔽Formations are also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do //🔽rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do // rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also formations.🔽Consciousness is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //🔽ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o // ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also consciousness.🔽Name and form are also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so //🔽skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so // skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also name and form.🔽The six sense sources are also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go /🔽reg pa nyid @114b kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go / reg pa nyid @114b kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also the six sense sources.🔽Contact is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o //🔽tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o // tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also contact.🔽Sensation is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also sensation.

original: sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Craving itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o //🔽len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o // len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is craving.🔽Clinging itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o //🔽srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o // srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is clinging.🔽Becoming itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o //🔽skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o // skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is becoming.🔽Birth itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o //🔽rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o // rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is birth.🔽Aging and death itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is aging and death.🔽The perfection of generosity itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is the perfection of generosity.🔽The perfection of moral discipline itself is the dharma-dhātu.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The dharma-dhātu itself is the perfection of moral discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The perfection of patience itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the perfection of patience.🔽The perfection of perseverance itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the perfection of perseverance.🔽The perfection of concentration itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the perfection of concentration.🔽The perfection of wisdom itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi @115a *//🔽dbyings so // chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi @115a *// dbyings so // chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is the perfection of wisdom.🔽Inner emptiness itself is the dharma-constituent.🔽The dharma-constituent itself is inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Outer emptiness itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of the external.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The emptiness of the external and the internal is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do //🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of the external and the internal.🔽The emptiness of emptiness is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //🔽chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do // chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the great is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do // don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of the great.🔽The emptiness of the ultimate is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of the uncompounded.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The emptiness of what is endless and beginningless is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless.🔽The emptiness of what is not to be discarded is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang @115b bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang @115b bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The emptiness of all things is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The emptiness of defining attributes is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of defining attributes.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-things is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of non-things.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.🔽The applications of mindfulness are also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so //🔽yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so // yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the applications of mindfulness.🔽The right efforts are also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the right efforts.🔽The bases of supernatural powers are also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //🔽dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so // dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the bases of supernatural powers.🔽The faculties are also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so //🔽stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so // stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the faculties.🔽The powers are also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so // byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the powers.🔽The branches of enlightenment are also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings @116a *//
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings @116a *//
translated: The expanse of reality is also the branches of enlightenment.🔽The path is also the expanse of reality.🔽The expanse of reality is also the path.

original: nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The factors of awakening are the realm of phenomena.🔽The noble eightfold path is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //🔽'phags ba'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o // 'phags ba'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the noble eightfold path.🔽The noble truths are the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so; ;chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so //🔽chad  med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so; ;chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so // chad  med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The concentrations are the realm of phenomena. The realm of phenomena is the concentrations.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The immeasurables are the realm of phenomena.🔽The formless absorptions are the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Liberation is the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so //
translated: The liberation gate of emptiness is the dharma-dhātu.🔽The liberation gate of signlessness is the dharma-dhātu.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //🔽chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so // chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The liberation gate of wishlessness is the dharma-dhātu.🔽The dharma-dhātu is the liberation gate of emptiness.🔽The dharma-dhātu is the liberation gate of signlessness.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //
translated: The dharma-dhātu is the liberation gate of wishlessness.

original: mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so //🔽chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so //🔽ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang @116b chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyangs so // chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so // ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang @116b chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-dhātu is the superknowledges.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
translated: The dharma-dhātu is the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-dhātu is the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are also the realm of phenomena.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas are also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so //🔽mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so // mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also the powers of the tathāgatas.🔽Fearlessness is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so // so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also fearlessness.🔽Correct understanding is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so //🔽byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so // byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also correct understanding.🔽Great love is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o //🔽snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o // snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also great love.🔽Great compassion is also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o //
translated: The realm of phenomena is also great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The unique qualities of the buddhas are also the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The unshared qualities of the buddhas are also the expanse of reality.🔽The result of stream enterer is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the result of stream enterer.🔽The result of once-returner is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the result of once-returner.🔽The result of non-returner is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o // dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also the result of non-returner.🔽Arhatship is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do //🔽rang @117a *// byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do // rang @117a *// byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The expanse of reality is also arhatship.🔽Solitary realizers’ enlightenment is also the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo //
translated: The expanse of reality is also solitary realizers’ enlightenment.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The knowledge of the aspects of the path is also the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-constituent is also the knowledge of the aspects of the path.🔽The knowledge of all aspects is also the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The dharma-constituent is also the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni /
translated: Subhūti, if bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom were to see any dharma other than the dharma-constituent,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par yang mi 'gyur te /🔽chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par yang mi 'gyur te / chos thams cad ni /
translated: they would not stand in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽Because all dharmas

original: chos kyi dbyings yin pas /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings yin pas /
translated: are the dharma-constituent.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes nas chos thams cad ming med pa la ming gi brdas chos ston te /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes nas chos thams cad ming med pa la ming gi brdas chos ston te /
translated: Therefore, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they teach the Dharma with the conventional symbols of names to all phenomena, which are nameless, after knowing all phenomena to be the realm of phenomena.

original: 'di ni / gzugs zhes bya'o //🔽'di ni / tshor ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / gzugs zhes bya'o // 'di ni / tshor ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called ‘form.’🔽This is called ‘feeling.’

original: 'di ni / 'du shes zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / 'du shes zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called ‘perception.’

original: 'di ni / 'du byed ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / 'du byed ces bya'o //
translated: This is called ‘volitional factors.’

original: 'di ni / rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called ‘consciousness.’

original: 'di ni / mig ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / mig ces bya'o //
translated: This is called ‘eyes.’

original: 'di ni / rna ba zhes bya'o //🔽'di ni / sna zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / rna ba zhes bya'o // 'di ni / sna zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called ‘ears.’🔽This is called ‘nose.’

original: 'di ni / lce zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lce zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called ‘tongue.’

original: 'di ni / lus zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lus zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called ‘body.’

original: 'di ni / yid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / yid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called ‘mind.’

original: 'di ni / gzugs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / gzugs zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called ‘form.’

original: 'di ni / sgra zhes bya'o //🔽@117b 'di ni /
analyzed: 'di ni / sgra zhes bya'o // @117b 'di ni /
translated: This is called ‘sound.’

original: dri zhes bya'o //🔽'di ni / ro zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dri zhes bya'o // 'di ni / ro zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called ‘smell.’🔽This is called ‘taste.’

original: 'di ni / reg ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / reg ces bya'o //

analyzed: 'di ni / chos zhes bya'o //

analyzed: 'di ni / mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o // 'di ni / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o; ;'di ni / sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: 'di ni / lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: 'di ni / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o // 'di ni / sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o //

original: 'di ni / lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called tongue contact.

analyzed: 'di ni / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called body contact.

original: 'di ni / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called mind contact.

analyzed: 'di ni / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o //

original: 'di ni / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o //

original: 'di ni / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o //

original: 'di ni / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o //

original: 'di ni / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o //

original: 'di ni / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o //

original: 'di ni / sa'i khams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / sa'i khams zhes bya'o //

analyzed: skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs sam /

analyzed: rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba'am /

analyzed: glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byas sam /

original: sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'am /
analyzed: sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'am /

original: shes rab bsgoms pa'am /
analyzed: shes rab bsgoms pa'am /

analyzed: khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam /

analyzed: ri rab bstan tam; rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam /

analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bstan tam /

analyzed: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams bstan tam / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams bstan tam /

original: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: the Brahmapārṣadya gods,

original: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams bstan tam /

analyzed: snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /

original: chung snang gi lha rnams bstan tam /🔽tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: chung snang gi lha rnams bstan tam / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /

analyzed: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam / dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: the Ābhāsvara gods,🔽the Śubhakṛtsna gods,

original: chung dge'i lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: chung dge'i lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: the Parīttaśubha gods,

original: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: the Apramāṇaśubha gods,

original: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams bstan @120a *//🔽tam / che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams bstan @120a *// tam / che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: the gods of the Heaven of Excellent Virtue,🔽the gods of the Heaven of Great Reward,

original: chung che'i lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: chung che'i lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: the gods of the Heaven of Minor Reward,

original: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /

original: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /🔽mi che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam / mi che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: the gods of the Heaven of Great Fruit,
