analyzed: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams bstan tam / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: the gods of the Heaven of No Hardship,🔽the gods of the Heaven of Excellent Vision,

original: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: the gods of the Heaven of Perfect Joy,

original: 'og min gyi lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: 'og min gyi lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: the gods of the Highest Heaven,

original: nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: the gods of the Sphere of Limitless Space,

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: the gods of the Sphere of Limitless Consciousness,

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: the gods of the Sphere of Nothingness,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam /
translated: and the gods of the Sphere of Neither Perception nor No Perception.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mang pa bstan tam /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mang pa bstan tam /
translated: or the stream enterers, or the once-returners, or the non-returners, or the arhats, or the pratyekabuddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: or the bodhisattva great beings, starting from the first production of the thought,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
translated: practicing the perfection of giving, practicing the perfection of morality, practicing the perfection of patience, practicing the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: practicing the perfection of concentration, practicing the perfection of wisdom, practicing inner emptiness, practicing outer emptiness, practicing inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / @120b chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / @120b chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: They are the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great immensity, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, and the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
translated: They are those who practice the emptiness of essential nature of non-things, those who practice the applications of mindfulness, those who practice the right efforts, those who practice the legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan dang /
analyzed: dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan dang /
translated: those who practice the faculties, those who practice the powers, those who practice the branches of awakening, those who practice the noble eightfold path, those who practice the noble truths, those who practice the meditative stabilizations,

original: rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la spyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la spyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
translated: those who practice the liberations, those who practice the concentrations, those who practice the absorptions, those who perfect the first bhūmi, those who perfect the second bhūmi, those who perfect the third bhūmi,

original: sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa drug pa yongs su @121a *//
analyzed: sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa drug pa yongs su @121a *//
translated: the fifth level, that of The One Who Meets the Challenge,🔽the sixth level, that of The One Who Has Gone Far,🔽the seventh level, that of The One Who Has Appeared Face to Face,🔽the eighth level, that of The One Who Has the Dharani Powers,

original: rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
analyzed: rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
translated: the ninth level, that of The One with Certainty,🔽and the tenth level, that of The Cloud of Dharma.🔽They are: the bodhisattvas’ entry into the absence of faults,🔽the accomplishment of the higher perceptions,🔽the bodhisattvas’ compassion through those higher perceptions,🔽the illumination of the world systems,

original: byang chub sems dpa' skyon med par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par brtse zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' skyon med par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par brtse zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
translated: the bringing of sentient beings to full maturity,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nying lags yongs su gtong ba dang / spyad par dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nying lags yongs su gtong ba dang / spyad par dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang /
translated: “Do you teach the purification of buddha realms, the giving away of major and minor body parts, the practice of difficult practices, the accomplishment of the powers of the tathāgatas, the accomplishment of the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par bsgrub pa de dgra bstan tam /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par bsgrub pa de dgra bstan tam /
translated: the accomplishment of the aspects of complete knowing, the accomplishment of the distinct qualities of a buddha, the accomplishment of great love, and the accomplishment of great compassion?

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bstan na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bstan na /
translated: “Do you teach the body of a buddha, complete with all its major and minor body parts?

original: de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: “When you do so, childish beings think,

original: kye ma mi 'dis legs par bslabs pa ngo mtshar che'i /
analyzed: kye ma mi 'dis legs par bslabs pa ngo mtshar che'i /
translated: ‘Oh, this person is well trained. How amazing!

original: re mdzes dag byed /
analyzed: re mdzes dag byed /
translated: How beautiful!

original: de ltar skye ba dga' bar byed cing /🔽gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ltar skye ba dga' bar byed cing / gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
translated: In this way, they delight beings with their births.

original: glang po'i @121b gzugs dang / rta'i gzugs dang / bal lang gi gzugs dang / rnga mo dang / lug gi gzugs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs ston pa dang / skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang /
analyzed: glang po'i @121b gzugs dang / rta'i gzugs dang / bal lang gi gzugs dang / rnga mo dang / lug gi gzugs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs ston pa dang / skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang /
translated: They display various different forms, such as the forms of elephants, horses, oxen, camels, sheep, men, women, boys, and girls. They display delightful parks, palaces,

original: dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / kun dga'i re ba mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / nags tshal mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / de dag tu stan dang / 'khor gyi stan dang / gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste /
analyzed: dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / kun dga'i re ba mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / nags tshal mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang / de dag tu stan dang / 'khor gyi stan dang / gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste /
translated: ascetic forests, delightful gardens, delightful ponds, and delightful forests. They set out various seats, seats for the retinue, and bases.

original: me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs mang po de lta bu ston pa dang / glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byed cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang /
analyzed: me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs mang po de lta bu ston pa dang / glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byed cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang /
translated: They give gifts that delight beings by displaying flowers, garlands, incense, ointments, food, and various other articles, and by singing and playing music.

original: tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par brtse ba dang / shes rab bsgom pa dang / rnam pa 'di dag gis skye bo dga' bar byed cing /
analyzed: tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par brtse ba dang / shes rab bsgom pa dang / rnam pa 'di dag gis skye bo dga' bar byed cing /
translated: They delight beings by guarding morality, by accomplishing patience, by undertaking perseverance, by being absorbed in concentration, and by cultivating wisdom.

original: rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang / bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang / khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang / ri rab ston pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /
analyzed: rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang / bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang / khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang / ri rab ston pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /
translated: They delight beings by displaying the lineage of a great and powerful kṣatriya, by displaying the lineage of a great and powerful brahmin, by displaying the lineage of a great and powerful householder, by displaying Mount Sumeru, by displaying the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika gods,

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams ston pa dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams ston pa dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /
translated: the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, the gods of the Yāma Heaven, the gods of the Tuṣita Heaven, the gods of the Nirmāṇarati Heaven, the gods of the Paranirmitavaśavartin Heaven, the gods of the Brahmākāyika Heaven,

original: @122a *// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung snang gi lha rnams ston pa dang /
analyzed: @122a *// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung snang gi lha rnams ston pa dang /
translated: the gods of the Brahmapurohita Heaven, the gods of the Brahmapārṣadya Heaven, the gods of the Mahābrahmāṇa Heaven, the gods of the Ābhāsvara Heaven, the gods of the Parīttābha Heaven,

original: tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung dge'i lha rnams ston pa dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /
analyzed: tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung dge'i lha rnams ston pa dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /
translated: the gods of Infinite Radiance, the gods of Luminous Radiance, the gods of Limited Virtue, the gods of Immeasurable Virtue, the gods of Perfected Virtue,

original: che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung che'i lha rnams ston pa dang / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / mi che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /
analyzed: che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung che'i lha rnams ston pa dang / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / mi che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /
translated: the gods of Greatness, the gods of Limited Greatness, the gods of Immeasurable Greatness, the gods of Great Result, the gods of Non-perplexity, the gods of No-thought,

original: shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /
analyzed: shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams ston pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /
translated: the gods of the Heaven of the Four Great Kings, the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, the Heaven Free from Strife, the Heaven of Joy, the Heaven of Delighting in Emanations, the Heaven of Making Use of Others’ Emanations, the Heaven of the Highest Gods, the gods of the Heaven of the Cloudless, the Heaven of Merit, the Heaven of Great Fruition, the Heaven of Perfected Virtue, the Heaven of Great Brahmā, the Heaven of Limited Radiance, the Heaven of Limitless Radiance, the Heaven of Luminous Radiance, the Heaven of Limited Splendor, the Heaven of Limitless Splendor, the Heaven of Radiant Splendor, the Heaven of Akaniṣṭha, the gods of the Sphere of Limitless Space, the Sphere of Limitless Consciousness,

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / 'du shas med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha gzugs med pa rnams ston pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams ston pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams ston pa dang /
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / 'du shas med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha gzugs med pa rnams ston pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams ston pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams ston pa dang /
translated: the Sphere of Nothingness, and the Sphere of Neither Perception Nor Non-Perception, the gods of the Formless Realm, the stream enterers, the once-returners,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po rnams ston cing /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po rnams ston cing /
translated: the non-returners, the arhats, and the many solitary buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems @122b dpa' chen po rnams sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems @122b dpa' chen po rnams sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: They also display the bodhisattva great beings from the first generation of bodhicitta

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
translated: those who practice the perfection of generosity, those who practice the perfection of moral discipline, those who practice the perfection of patience, those who practice the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: those who practice the perfection of concentration, those who practice the perfection of wisdom, those who practice inner emptiness, those who practice outer emptiness, those who practice inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: those who practice the emptiness of emptiness, those who practice great emptiness, those who practice ultimate emptiness, those who practice conditioned emptiness, those who practice unconditioned emptiness,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: They are those who practice the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities. They are those who practice the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa @123a *//
analyzed: dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa @123a *//
translated: they practice the powers,

original: dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
translated: they practice the branches of awakening, they practice the noble eightfold path, they practice the noble truths, they practice the meditative stabilizations, liberations, samādhis, and absorptions,

original: sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
analyzed: sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
translated: they perfect the first ground, they perfect the second ground, they perfect the third ground, they perfect the fourth ground, they perfect the fifth ground,

original: sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
analyzed: sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
translated: the sixth, the seventh, the eighth, the ninth, and the tenth.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
translated: It is to enter into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas, to accomplish the superknowledges, to play with those superknowledges, to illuminate the world systems, to ripen beings,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nyid lag yongs su gtong ba dang / dka' pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nyid lag yongs su gtong ba dang / dka' pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /
translated: They teach the purification of the buddhafields, the giving away of limbs and minor parts of the body, the practice of austerities, the accomplishment of the powers of the Tathagata, the accomplishment of the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa @123b rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa de dag kyang ston cing /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa @123b rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa de dag kyang ston cing /
translated: the accomplishment of the analytical knowledges, the accomplishment of the special qualities of the Buddha, the realization of great love, and the realization of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i yan lag dang / nyid lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ston pa ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i yan lag dang / nyid lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ston pa ni /
translated: They teach the perfection of all the major and minor parts of the body of the Buddha.

original: ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: It is wonderful!

original: zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzin do //
analyzed: zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzin do //
translated: They are greatly astonished.

original: de la skyes bu mkhas shing gsal la yid rno ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de la skyes bu mkhas shing gsal la yid rno ba dang ldan pa /
translated: There are wise, clear-minded, and sharp-witted people

original: dpyod pa dang dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni /
translated: Those who are wise and holy

original: 'di snyam ste /
analyzed: 'di snyam ste /
translated: think as follows:

original: 'di la chos gang yang dmigs su med na /
analyzed: 'di la chos gang yang dmigs su med na /
translated: “If no phenomenon is apprehended here,

original: mi 'di de ltar med pa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po 'di dag dga' bar byed pa ni; ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so //🔽snyam ste / sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: mi 'di de ltar med pa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po 'di dag dga' bar byed pa ni; ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so // snyam ste / sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: then it is a wondrous and marvelous thing that this person delights this great crowd of people with a nonexistent phenomenon.”🔽They think,

original: dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa'o //
translated: “These sentient beings have the notion of a thing with regard to what is not a thing.”

original: zhes bya bar de dag gi shes pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya bar de dag gi shes pa 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus their knowledge arises.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong ste /🔽thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can du mi dmigs /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong ste / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can du mi dmigs /
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not see any phenomenon that is not included in the dharma-constituent.

original: sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs te /
translated: With skillful means they bring sentient beings to maturity, but they do not apprehend sentient beings and do not apprehend the designation of sentient beings.

original: bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin /
translated: They themselves give gifts,

original: gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to give.

original: sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of giving.

original: sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa gtong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa gtong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of others’ generosity, and they rejoice in it.

original: bdag @124a *// kyang tshul khrims srung ba yin /
analyzed: bdag @124a *// kyang tshul khrims srung ba yin /
translated: They themselves maintain ethical discipline.

original: gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to maintain ethical discipline.

original: tshul khrims kyi legs par brjod pa yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi legs par brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of ethical discipline.

original: sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of others’ ethical discipline, and they rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang bzod pa bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang bzod pa bsgom pa yin /
translated: They themselves cultivate patience.

original: gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to cultivate patience.

original: bzod pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: bzod pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of patience.

original: sems can gzhan gang bzod pa bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang bzod pa bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of others’ patience, and they rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin /
translated: They themselves make an effort at perseverance.

original: gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to be diligent.

original: brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of diligence.

original: sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of others’ diligence, and they rejoice in others’ diligence.

original: bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
translated: They themselves rest in equipoise in meditative concentration.

original: gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to be in meditative concentration.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of meditative concentration.

original: sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of others’ meditative concentration, and they rejoice in others’ meditative concentration.

original: bdag kyang shes rab bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang shes rab bsgom pa yin /
translated: They themselves cultivate wisdom.

original: gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to be wise.

original: shes rab kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of wisdom.

original: sems can gzhan gang shes rab sgom pa de dag gis legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' @124b bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang shes rab sgom pa de dag gis legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' @124b bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of others’ wisdom, and they rejoice in others’ wisdom.

original: bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa yin /
translated: I myself will follow the path of the ten virtues.

original: gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: I will encourage others to follow the path of the ten virtues.

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of the path of the ten virtues.

original: sems can gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of those who follow the path of the ten virtues, and I will rejoice in their company.

original: bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin /
translated: I myself will follow the eight-branched fasting practice.

original: gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: I will encourage others to follow the eight-branched fasting practice.

original: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin gyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin gyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of the eight-branched fasting practice.

original: sems can gzhan gang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of those who follow the eight-branched fasting practice, and I will rejoice in their company.

original: bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa yin /
translated: I myself uphold the five precepts.

original: gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: I encourage others to uphold the five precepts.

original: bslab pa'i gnas lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: bslab pa'i gnas lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I speak in praise of the five precepts.

original: sems can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: I speak in praise of those who uphold the five precepts, and I rejoice in them.🔽I myself enter into the first concentration.

original: bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin; gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin; gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: I encourage others to enter into the first concentration.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i legs pa brjod pa yin /🔽sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par @125a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i legs pa brjod pa yin / sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par @125a *//
translated: I speak in praise of the first concentration.

original: 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /🔽bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin / bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
translated: I speak in praise of those who enter into the first concentration, and I rejoice in them.🔽I myself enter into the second concentration.

original: gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: I encourage others to enter into the second concentration.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of the second concentration.

original: sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of those other sentient beings who are absorbed in the second concentration, and I will rejoice in them.

original: bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
translated: I will myself be absorbed in the third concentration.

original: gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: I will encourage others to be absorbed in the third concentration.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of the third concentration.

original: sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of those other sentient beings who are absorbed in the third concentration, and I will rejoice in them.

original: bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
translated: I will myself be absorbed in the fourth concentration.

original: gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: I will encourage others to be absorbed in the fourth concentration.

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I will speak in praise of the fourth concentration.

original: sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the meditative stability of others and rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
translated: “ They themselves rest in evenness in loving kindness.

original: gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to rest in evenness in loving kindness.

original: byams pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: byams pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of loving kindness.

original: sems can @125b gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can @125b gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the meditative stability of others and rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
translated: “ They themselves rest in evenness in compassion.

original: gzhan yang snying rje la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang snying rje la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to rest in evenness in compassion.

original: snying rje'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: snying rje'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of compassion.

original: sems can gzhan gang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the meditative stability of others and rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
translated: “ They themselves rest in evenness in empathetic joy.

original: gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to be joyful.

original: dga' ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: dga' ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of joy.

original: sems can gzhan gang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of others who are joyful, and they rejoice in accord with them.

original: bdag kyang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
translated: They themselves rest in equanimity.

original: gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to rest in equanimity.

original: btang snyoms kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: btang snyoms kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of equanimity.

original: sems can gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of others who rest in equanimity, and they rejoice in accord with them.

original: bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
translated: They themselves rest in the sphere of infinite space.

original: gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to rest in the sphere of infinite space.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the sphere of infinite space.

original: sems can gzhan gang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun @126a *//🔽pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun @126a *// pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They are delighted and rejoice in others who rest in the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite space.

original: bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
translated: “They themselves rest in the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite consciousness.

original: gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to rest in the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite consciousness.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite consciousness.

original: sems can gzhan gang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /🔽bdag kyang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin / bdag kyang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
translated: They are delighted and rejoice in others who rest in the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite consciousness.🔽“They themselves rest in the meditative absorption of the sense field of nothing whatsoever.

original: gzhan yang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to rest in the meditative absorption of the sense field of nothing whatsoever.

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the meditative absorption of the sense field of nothing whatsoever.

original: sems can gzhan gang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the meditative absorption of the base of nothingness of other sentient beings and they rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /
translated: “They themselves enter into the meditative absorption of the base of neither perception nor nonperception.

original: gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to enter into the meditative absorption of the base of neither perception nor nonperception.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the meditative absorption of the base of neither perception nor nonperception.

original: sems can gzhan gang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the meditative absorption of the base of neither perception nor nonperception of other sentient beings and they rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa yin /
translated: “They themselves cultivate the applications of mindfulness.

original: gzhan yang @126b dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang @126b dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to cultivate the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the applications of mindfulness.

original: sems can gzhan gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the close mindfulness of others and rejoice in harmony with them.

original: bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa yin /
translated: “They themselves cultivate the correct exertions.

original: gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to cultivate the correct exertions.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the correct exertions.

original: sems can gzhan gang yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the correct exertions of others and rejoice in harmony with them.

original: bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa yin /
translated: “They themselves cultivate the bases of miraculous power.

original: gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to cultivate the bases of miraculous power.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the bases of miraculous power.

original: sems can gzhan gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They are the ones who speak in praise of the cultivation of the bases of supernatural powers by other beings and who rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang dbang po rnams bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang dbang po rnams bsgom pa yin /
translated: “They are the ones who cultivate the faculties.

original: gzhan yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They are the ones who encourage others to cultivate the faculties.

original: dbang po rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They are the ones who speak in praise of the faculties.

original: sems can gzhan gang dbang po rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang dbang po rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They are the ones who speak in praise of the cultivation of the faculties by other beings and who rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang stobs rnams bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang stobs rnams bsgom pa yin /
translated: “They are the ones who cultivate the powers.

original: gzhan yang stobs rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang stobs rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They are the ones who encourage others to cultivate the powers.

original: stobs rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They are the ones who speak in praise of the powers.

original: sems @127a *// can gzhan gang stobs rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems @127a *// can gzhan gang stobs rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They are the ones who speak in praise of the cultivation of the powers by other beings and who rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa yin; gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa yin; gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: I myself should practice the factors of awakening. I should encourage others to practice the factors of awakening.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I should speak in praise of the factors of awakening.

original: sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: I should speak in praise of others practicing the factors of awakening as well, welcoming it with delight.

original: bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yin /
translated: I myself should practice the noble eightfold path.

original: gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
