original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I should speak in praise of the noble eightfold path.

original: sems can gzhan gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: I should speak in praise of others practicing the noble eightfold path as well, welcoming it with delight.

original: bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa yin /
translated: I myself should practice the three gateways to liberation.

original: gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to practice the three gateways to liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the three gateways to liberation.

original: sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of others who practice the three gateways to liberation, and they rejoice in this.

original: bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa yin /
translated: They themselves cultivate the eight aspects of liberation.

original: gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to practice the eight aspects of liberation.

original: @127b rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: @127b rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the eight aspects of liberation.

original: sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of others who cultivate the eight aspects of liberation, and they rejoice in this.

original: bdag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa yin /
translated: They themselves cultivate the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: gzhan yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to practice the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They are the ones who speak in praise of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: sems can gzhan gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They are the ones who speak in praise of others cultivating the nine serial steps of meditative absorption and they are the ones who rejoice in that.

original: bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa yin /
translated: “They are the ones who cultivate the five kinds of supernormal knowledge.

original: gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They are the ones who encourage others to cultivate the five kinds of supernormal knowledge.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They are the ones who speak in praise of the five kinds of supernormal knowledge.

original: sems can gzhan gang mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They are the ones who speak in praise of others cultivating the five kinds of supernormal knowledge and they are the ones who rejoice in that.

original: bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa yin /🔽gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa yin / gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: “They are the ones who rest in equipoise in the meditative stabilities.🔽They are the ones who encourage others to rest in equipoise in the meditative stabilities.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They are the ones who speak in praise of resting in equipoise in the meditative stabilities.

original: sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the samādhis of other sentient beings and they rejoice in them.

original: bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa yin /🔽gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo @128a *//
analyzed: bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa yin / gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo @128a *//
translated: “They themselves cultivate the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to cultivate the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the cultivation of the dhāraṇī gateways by others and they rejoice in them.

original: bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa yin /
translated: “They themselves cultivate the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They encourage others to cultivate the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They speak in praise of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: sems can gzhan gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They are those who speak in praise of the cultivation of the ten powers of the tathāgatas and of those sentient beings who cultivate them, and they are those who rejoice in them.

original: bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom pa yin /
translated: “They are those who cultivate the four fearlessnesses.

original: gzhan yang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They are those who encourage others to cultivate the four fearlessnesses.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They are those who speak in praise of the four fearlessnesses.

original: sems can gzhan gang mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They are those who speak in praise of the cultivation of the four fearlessnesses by others and rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom pa yin /
translated: “They are those who cultivate the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They are those who encourage others to cultivate the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They are those who speak in praise of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: sems can gzhan gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They are those who speak in praise of the cultivation of the four detailed and thorough knowledges by others and rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang byams pa chen po bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang byams pa chen po bsgom pa yin /
translated: I too cultivate great love.

original: gzhan yang @128b byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang @128b byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: I encourage others to cultivate great love.

original: byams pa chen po'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I praise the cultivation of great love.

original: sems can gzhan gang byams pa chen po bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang byams pa chen po bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: I rejoice in the cultivation of great love by others.

original: bdag kyang snying rje chen po bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang snying rje chen po bsgom pa yin /
translated: I too cultivate great compassion.

original: gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: I encourage others to cultivate great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: I praise the cultivation of great compassion.

original: sems can gzhan gang snying rje chen po bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /🔽bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang snying rje chen po bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin / bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa yin /
translated: I rejoice in the cultivation of great compassion by others.🔽I too cultivate the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: I encourage others to cultivate the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They are those who praise the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They are those who praise and rejoice in the practice of others who cultivate the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: bdag kyang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa yin /
translated: They are those who accomplish the thirty-two major marks of a great being.

original: gzhan yang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag par skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag par skul ba yin /
translated: They are those who encourage others to accomplish the thirty-two major marks of a great being.

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: They are those who praise the thirty-two major marks of a great being.

original: sems can gzhan gang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They are those who praise and rejoice in the practice of others who accomplish the thirty-two major marks of a great being.

original: bdag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu sgrub pa yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu sgrub pa yin /
translated: They are those who accomplish the eighty minor marks.

original: gzhan yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par @129a *//🔽skul ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par @129a *//🔽skul ba yin /
translated: They are those who encourage others to accomplish the eighty minor marks.

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i legs pa brjod pa yin /
translated: they are the good qualities of the eighty minor signs.

original: sems can gzhan gang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin /
translated: They are the ones who speak in praise of those other sentient beings who are practicing the eighty minor signs, and they rejoice in them.

original: rab 'byor / gal te chos kyi dbyings sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin ma yin nam /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te chos kyi dbyings sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin ma yin nam /
translated: Subhūti, if the dharma-constituent were not just as it was before,

original: bar du'ang de bzhin ma yin du zin na ni /
analyzed: bar du'ang de bzhin ma yin du zin na ni /
translated: and also just as it will be later,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston par mi 'gyur /
translated: then when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they would not, with skillful means, teach the dharma-constituent to sentient beings.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par mi 'gyur /
translated: They would not bring sentient beings to maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par mi 'gyur te /
translated: They would not purify a buddhafield.

original: rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings de sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin bar du'ang de bzhin bas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings de sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin bar du'ang de bzhin bas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston
translated: “Subhūti, the dharma-constituent is just as it was before, just as it will be later, and just as it is in the present. Therefore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom with skillful means teach the dharma-constituent to beings.

original: to // sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do //
analyzed: to // sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do //
translated: They practice the bodhisattva practice for the sake of beings.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: They bring beings to maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: They purify a buddhafield.

original: mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i le'u drug cu rtsa bzhi ba'o ////
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i le'u drug cu rtsa bzhi ba'o ////
translated: This was the sixty-fourth chapter, “Teaching the Equality,” of “The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya @129b gya lnga pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya @129b gya lnga pa //

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ltar gal te sems can yang shin tu dmigs su ma mchis la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ltar gal te sems can yang shin tu dmigs su ma mchis la /
translated: “Lord!🔽If even a being is not apprehended,

original: sems can du dmigs pa'ang ma mchis na /
analyzed: sems can du dmigs pa'ang ma mchis na /
translated: and the apprehension of a being does not exist,

original: su'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: su'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: for whose sake do bodhisattva great beings cultivate the perfection of wisdom?”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Venerable Subhūti having said that, the Lord said to him:

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' tshad mar byas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' tshad mar byas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ste /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings, having taken the very limit of reality as their measure, cultivate the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan la /
translated: Subhūti, if the very limit of reality were one thing,🔽and the perfection of wisdom another,

original: sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan zhig ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan zhig ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the limit of sentient beings were not the limit of reality, then the perfection of wisdom of the bodhisattva great being would not be cultivated.

original: rab 'byor / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Subhūti, the limit of reality is not one thing,

original: sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin pas /
analyzed: sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin pas /
translated: and the limit of sentient beings is not another.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ste /
translated: Therefore, bodhisattva great beings cultivate the perfection of wisdom for the sake of sentient beings.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug pa med par sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug pa med par sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god do //
translated: Bodhisattva great beings who cultivate the perfection of wisdom establish sentient beings in the limit of reality without disturbing the limit of reality.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Blessed One,

original: gal te de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang @130a *//🔽gzhan ma lags /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang @130a *// gzhan ma lags /
translated: if the limit of reality is not one thing

original: sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na /
analyzed: sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na /
translated: and the limit of sentient beings is not another,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur ram /
translated: Will the very limit of reality stand in the very limit of reality?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur na ni des rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur na ni des rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: if the very limit of reality were to stand in the very limit of reality, then a nature would stand in a nature.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rang bzhin la ni rang bzhin gnas pa ma mchis na /
analyzed: rang bzhin la ni rang bzhin gnas pa ma mchis na /
translated: since a nature does not stand in a nature,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god pa lags /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom set beings in the very limit of reality?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur ba'ang med /
analyzed: rab 'byor / yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur ba'ang med /
translated: “Su­bhūti, the very limit of reality does not stand in the very limit of reality,

original: rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur ba'ang med na /
analyzed: rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur ba'ang med na /
translated: and a nature does not stand in a nature.

original: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god de /
analyzed: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god de /
translated: But when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, with skill in means they establish the limit of sentient beings in the limit of reality.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do //
translated: They do not disturb the limit of reality.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The limit of sentient beings is not one thing,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin te /
translated: and the limit of reality is not another.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: sems can gyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: sems can gyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de /
translated: the limit of sentient beings and the limit of reality are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med do //
translated: and cannot be made two.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @130b chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par mi bgyid pa de lta bu'i
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @130b chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par mi bgyid pa de lta bu'i
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, with skill in means they establish sentient beings in the limit of reality without disturbing the limit of reality.

original: thabs gang lags /
analyzed: thabs gang lags /
translated: What is the method?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied:

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: “Subhūti, here, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, starting from the first production of the mind of awakening,

original: sems can rnams sbyin pa la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: sems can rnams sbyin pa la rab tu 'god do //
translated: they establish sentient beings in generosity.

original: sbyin pa la rab tu bkod nas sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' dang / tha ma'i mtha' dang / dbus ston te /
analyzed: sbyin pa la rab tu bkod nas sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' dang / tha ma'i mtha' dang / dbus ston te /
translated: Having established them in generosity, they teach the beginning, end, and middle of that generosity.

original: ji ltar sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' yang stong /
analyzed: ji ltar sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' yang stong /
translated: ‘Just as the beginning of that generosity is empty,

original: tha mi'o mtha' yang stong /
analyzed: tha mi'o mtha' yang stong /
translated: the end is also empty,

original: dbus kyang stong pa de ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang stong /
analyzed: dbus kyang stong pa de ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang stong /
translated: and the middle is also empty, so the result of generosity is also empty.

original: sbyin bdag kyang stong /
analyzed: sbyin bdag kyang stong /
translated: The benefactor is also empty.

original: len pa'ang stong par ston cing /
analyzed: len pa'ang stong par ston cing /
translated: The recipient is also empty.’

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: They teach, ‘Son of noble family,

original: de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la don de dag med kyi /🔽sbyin pa'ang gzhan la /🔽sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no //
analyzed: de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la don de dag med kyi / sbyin pa'ang gzhan la / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no //
translated: in this way, those things do not exist in the limit of reality.🔽Do not think, “Generosity is one thing,

original: snyam du ma sems shig /
analyzed: snyam du ma sems shig /
translated: and the result of generosity is another.”

original: sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la /
translated: The donor is one thing,🔽the recipient another,

original: len pa'ang gzhan no //🔽snyam du ma sems shig /
analyzed: len pa'ang gzhan no // snyam du ma sems shig /
translated: and the gift another.

original: rigs kyi bu /🔽khyod na ma sbyin pa'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu / khyod na ma sbyin pa'ang gzhan la /
translated: Noble son,🔽the donor is one thing,🔽the result of generosity another,

original: sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no //🔽snyam du mi sems /🔽sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no // snyam du mi sems / sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la /
translated: and the gift another.🔽The donor is one thing,🔽the recipient another,

original: len pa'ang gzhan no //
analyzed: len pa'ang gzhan no //
translated: and the gift another.

original: snyam du mi sems pa de'i tshe khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di bdud rtsi dang / bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang / mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur te /
analyzed: snyam du mi sems pa de'i tshe khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di bdud rtsi dang / bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang / mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur te /
translated: When you do not think in this way, your generosity will be nectar, the result of generosity will be nectar, and in the end it will be nectar.

original: sbyin pa 'di gzugs yongs su ma 'dzin cig /
analyzed: sbyin pa 'di gzugs yongs su ma 'dzin cig /
translated: Do not grasp at generosity as form,

original: tshor @131a *// ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma 'dzin cig /
analyzed: tshor @131a *// ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma 'dzin cig /
translated: do not grasp at it as feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni /
translated: Because this generosity of yours

original: sbyin pas stong ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pas stong ngo //
translated: is empty of generosity,

original: de'i 'bras bu'ang 'bras bus stong ngo //🔽sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu'ang 'bras bus stong ngo // sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: its result is empty of result,🔽the donor is empty of donor,

original: len pa'ang len pas stong ste /
analyzed: len pa'ang len pas stong ste /
translated: and the recipient is empty of recipient.

original: stong pa nyid la ni /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la ni /
translated: Emptiness

original: sbyin pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: sbyin pa mi dmigs /
translated: He does not apprehend generosity,

original: sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / sbyin bdag dang / len pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / sbyin bdag dang / len pa mi dmigs so //
translated: nor the result of generosity, nor the giver, nor the recipient.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar chos de dag ni /🔽ngo bo nyid kyis shin tu stong ngo //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar chos de dag ni / ngo bo nyid kyis shin tu stong ngo //
translated: And why?

original: zhes brjod do //
analyzed: zhes brjod do //
translated: Because those dharmas are empty of their own intrinsic nature.

original: gzhan yang rab 'byor /
analyzed: gzhan yang rab 'byor /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams tshul khrims la bgod de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams tshul khrims la bgod de /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom skillfully establish sentient beings in morality,

original: tshur rigs kyi bu /🔽srog gcod pa spongs la /
analyzed: tshur rigs kyi bu / srog gcod pa spongs la /
translated: they say, ‘Come here, son of a good family!

original: srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig /🔽ma byin par len pa spongs la /
analyzed: srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig / ma byin par len pa spongs la /
translated: Abandon killing and turn away from killing.

original: ma byin par len pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig /🔽'dod pas log par g-yem pa spongs la /
analyzed: ma byin par len pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spongs la /
translated: Abandon taking what is not given and turn away from taking what is not given.

original: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa las phyin ldog bar gyis shig /🔽brdzun du smra ba spongs la /
analyzed: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa las phyin ldog bar gyis shig / brdzun du smra ba spongs la /
translated: Abandon sexual misconduct and turn away from sexual misconduct.

original: brdzun du smra ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig /
analyzed: brdzun du smra ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig /
translated: Abandon lying and turn away from lying.

original: phra ma spongs la /
analyzed: phra ma spongs la /
translated: Give up slander.

original: phra ma las phyir ldog par gyis shig /🔽zhe gcod pa'i tshig spongs la /
analyzed: phra ma las phyir ldog par gyis shig / zhe gcod pa'i tshig spongs la /
translated: Turn away from slander.🔽Give up harsh words.

original: zhe gcod pa'i tshig las phyir ldog par gyis shig /🔽tshig 'khyal pa spongs la /
analyzed: zhe gcod pa'i tshig las phyir ldog par gyis shig / tshig 'khyal pa spongs la /
translated: Turn away from harsh words.🔽Give up idle talk.

original: tshig 'khyal pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig /🔽chags sems @131b spongs la /🔽chags sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig /
analyzed: tshig 'khyal pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig / chags sems @131b spongs la / chags sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig /
translated: Turn away from idle talk.🔽Give up covetousness.🔽Turn away from covetousness.

original: gnod sems spongs la /
analyzed: gnod sems spongs la /
translated: Give up malice.

original: gnod sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig /
analyzed: gnod sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig /
translated: Turn away from malice.

original: log par lta ba spongs la log par lta pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig /
analyzed: log par lta ba spongs la log par lta pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig /
translated: Give up wrong views. Turn away from wrong views.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: chos 'di dag la ji ltar yongs su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gang yang med kyi /
analyzed: chos 'di dag la ji ltar yongs su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gang yang med kyi /
translated: these phenomena have no intrinsic nature whatsoever, as you have examined them to be.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: sems dang gang gi srog gcod par bya ba'i srog chags dang / srog gcod par btags pa dang / gang gis srog gcad par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
analyzed: sems dang gang gi srog gcod par bya ba'i srog chags dang / srog gcod par btags pa dang / gang gis srog gcad par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
translated: what are the phenomena that are the mind, the living being whose life is to be taken, the act of taking life, and the one who takes life?

original: gang ma byin par blang ba dang / ma byin par len par btags pa dang / gang gis blang ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
analyzed: gang ma byin par blang ba dang / ma byin par len par btags pa dang / gang gis blang ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
translated: What is it to take what has not been given, to be designated as taking what has not been given, and what is it to take in such a way that it is taking what has not been given?

original: gang 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yam par btags pa dang / gang gis 'dod pas log par g-yem par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /🔽gang brdzun du smra ba dang / brdzun du smra bar btags pa dang / gang gis brdzun du smra bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
analyzed: gang 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yam par btags pa dang / gang gis 'dod pas log par g-yem par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin / gang brdzun du smra ba dang / brdzun du smra bar btags pa dang / gang gis brdzun du smra bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
translated: What is it to engage in sexual misconduct, to be designated as engaging in sexual misconduct, and what is it to engage in sexual misconduct in such a way that it is sexual misconduct?🔽What is it to lie, to be designated as lying, and what is it to lie in such a way that it is lying?

original: gang phra ma smra ba dang / phra ma smra bar btags pa dang / gang gis phra mar smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
analyzed: gang phra ma smra ba dang / phra ma smra bar btags pa dang / gang gis phra mar smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
translated: What is it to engage in slander, to be designated as engaging in slander, and what is it to engage in slander in such a way that it is slander?

original: gang zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang / zhe gcod bar btags pa dang / gang gis zhe gcod pa'i tshig tu smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
analyzed: gang zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang / zhe gcod bar btags pa dang / gang gis zhe gcod pa'i tshig tu smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
translated: What is it to speak harsh words, to be designated as speaking harsh words, and what is it to speak harsh words in such a way that it is speaking harsh words?

original: gang tshig 'khyal pa smra ba dang / tshig 'khyal par btags pa dang / gang gis tshig 'khyal par smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /🔽gang chags @132a *//
analyzed: gang tshig 'khyal pa smra ba dang / tshig 'khyal par btags pa dang / gang gis tshig 'khyal par smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin / gang chags @132a *//
translated: What is idle chatter, what is the imputation of idle chatter, and what is the Dharma that is idle chatter?

original: sems bskyed pa dang / chags sems su btags pa dang / gang gis chags sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa dang / chags sems su btags pa dang / gang gis chags sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
translated: What is covetousness, what is the imputation of covetousness, and what is the Dharma that is covetousness?

original: gang gnod sems bskyed pa dang / gnod sems su btags pa dang / gang gis gnod sems su bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
analyzed: gang gnod sems bskyed pa dang / gnod sems su btags pa dang / gang gis gnod sems su bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin /
translated: What is malice, what is the imputation of malice, and what is the Dharma that is malice?

original: gang log par lta ba dang / log par lta bar btags pa dang / gang gis log par lta ba mthong ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin zhes ston cing /🔽tshul khrims la 'god de /
analyzed: gang log par lta ba dang / log par lta bar btags pa dang / gang gis log par lta ba mthong ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin zhes ston cing / tshul khrims la 'god de /
translated: What is wrong views, what is the imputation of wrong views, and what is the Dharma that is wrong views?’

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings with such skillful means

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: When practicing the perfection of wisdom, they bring sentient beings to full maturity.

original: des de la sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu bstan te /
analyzed: des de la sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu bstan te /
translated: They teach them the results of generosity and moral discipline.

original: sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de'ang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstan pas /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de'ang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstan pas /
translated: And they teach that the results of generosity and moral discipline are empty of their own intrinsic reality.

original: rigs kyi bu des sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rig nas /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu des sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rig nas /
translated: “Noble son, when they know that the results of generosity and moral discipline are empty of their own intrinsic reality,

original: de la mngon par zhen pa mi byed do //
analyzed: de la mngon par zhen pa mi byed do //
translated: they do not cling to them.

original: mngon par zhen pa med pas /
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa med pas /
translated: Since they do not cling to them,

original: 'khrug par mi 'gyur zhing shes rab skyed do //
analyzed: 'khrug par mi 'gyur zhing shes rab skyed do //
translated: they do not become agitated and they develop wisdom.

original: shes rab des kyang bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad bcad nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste /
analyzed: shes rab des kyang bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad bcad nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste /
translated: And with that wisdom, they eliminate all latent and manifest afflictions and attain complete nirvāṇa in the expanse of nirvāṇa without remainder.

original: de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yin gyi /🔽don dam par ni /
analyzed: de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yin gyi / don dam par ni /
translated: But that is in terms of worldly convention.

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: It is not in terms of the ultimate.

original: de @132b ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽stong pa nyid la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'am /
analyzed: de @132b ci'i phyir zhe na / stong pa nyid la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'am /
translated: If you ask why,🔽it is because in emptiness no phenomenon whatsoever is apprehended that could attain nirvana,

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te /
translated: or that could pass into final nirvana.

original: de'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: His so-called nirvana

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: is as follows:

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can phan tshun gnod par sems shing /🔽'khrugs par gyur pa dang ldan pa dag mthong na /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do // rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can phan tshun gnod par sems shing / 'khrugs par gyur pa dang ldan pa dag mthong na /
translated: it is the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: 'di skad du 'dems shing ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad du 'dems shing ston te /
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, when great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom see sentient beings who are mutually hostile and who are engaged in conflict, they should exhort and instruct them as follows:

original: rigs kyi bu /🔽bzod pas sgrubs shig /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu / bzod pas sgrubs shig /
translated: ‘Sons of enlightened heritage!🔽You should practice patience!

original: bzod pa sgoms shig /
analyzed: bzod pa sgoms shig /
translated: You should cultivate patience!

original: des pa dang / sems zhi ba dang / nang du sems pa'i dang tshul can du gyis shig /
analyzed: des pa dang / sems zhi ba dang / nang du sems pa'i dang tshul can du gyis shig /
translated: You should be gentle, calm, and introspective!

original: gang gnod par byed pa dang / gang gis gnod par bya ba dang / gang la gnod par bya ba'i chos de dag ni /
analyzed: gang gnod par byed pa dang / gang gis gnod par bya ba dang / gang la gnod par bya ba'i chos de dag ni /
translated: The things that are harmful, the things that are harmed, and the things that harm—

original: thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin gyi /
analyzed: thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin gyi /
translated: all of these are empty of intrinsic nature.

original: rigs kyi bu /🔽gnod par byed pa ni /🔽su yod / gnod par ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu / gnod par byed pa ni / su yod / gnod par ni /
translated: Son of noble family,🔽who is the one who is harmed?🔽Who is the one who is harmed?

original: su la bya /
analyzed: su la bya /
translated: By what is the harm done?

original: cis ni / gnod par bya sems dang / chos de dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste /
analyzed: cis ni / gnod par bya sems dang / chos de dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste /
translated: The mind that is harmed and all these phenomena are empty of intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is empty of intrinsic nature

original: nam yang mi stong par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: nam yang mi stong par mi 'gyur te /
translated: is never not empty.

original: de ni / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma mdzad do //
analyzed: de ni / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma mdzad do //
translated: This was not created by the thus-gone ones,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas so //
translated: nor was it created by the bodhisattvas,

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas so //
translated: nor was it created by the solitary buddhas,

original: nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas so //
analyzed: nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas so //
translated: nor was it created by the hearers,

original: lha rnams kyis ma byas so //
analyzed: lha rnams kyis ma byas so //
translated: nor was it created by the gods,🔽nor was it created by the nāgas,🔽nor was it created by the yakṣas,

original: klu rnams kyis @133a *//🔽ma byas so //🔽gnod sbyin rnams kyis ma byas so //
analyzed: klu rnams kyis @133a *// ma byas so // gnod sbyin rnams kyis ma byas so //
translated: nor was it created by the gandharvas,🔽nor was it created by the asuras,🔽nor was it created by the garuḍas,

original: dri za rnams kyis ma byas so //
analyzed: dri za rnams kyis ma byas so //
translated: nor was it created by the kinnaras,🔽nor was it created by the mahoragas,🔽nor was it created by the humans,🔽nor was it created by the non-humans.

original: lha ma yin rnams kyis ma byas so //🔽nam mkha' lding rnams kyis ma byas so //
analyzed: lha ma yin rnams kyis ma byas so // nam mkha' lding rnams kyis ma byas so //
translated: The asuras did not make it.🔽The garuḍas did not make it.

original: mi'am ci rnams kyis ma byas so //
analyzed: mi'am ci rnams kyis ma byas so //
translated: The kinnaras did not make it.

original: lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ma byas so //
analyzed: lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ma byas so //
translated: The mahoragas did not make it.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas so //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas so //
translated: The gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm did not make it.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshang  pa dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge rgyas dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshang  pa dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge rgyas dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /
translated: The gods of the Trayas­triṃśa, Yāmā, Tuṣita, Nirmāṇa­rata, Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin, Brahmakāyika, Brahmapurohita, Brahmapārṣadya, Parīttābha, Apramāṇābha, Ābhāsvara, Parīttaśubha, Apramāṇaśubha, Śubhakṛtsna, Bṛhatphala, Asaṃjñisattva, Śuddhāvāsa, Ākāśānantyāyatana,

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas te /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas te /
translated: Vijñānānantyāyatana, Ākiñcanyāyatana, and Naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatana realms did not make it.

original: de ni / rtag par yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o //
analyzed: de ni / rtag par yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o //
translated: It is always empty by nature.

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni /
translated: That which is empty by nature

original: su la'ang gnod par mi byed do //
analyzed: su la'ang gnod par mi byed do //
translated: does not harm anyone.
